title: ID Please - Club Simulation
description:
Tired of not getting into exclusive clubs? Now you hold all the cards!
Take control as the new bouncer for the hottest club in the city. Everyone is trying to get in - but it is up to you to make sure everyone has good clean fun! 

The owner is fickle and wants his clubs exclusive. No shoes, no service. The line of customers will try to sneak past you, but your keen perception will identify all the tricksters. Stay on your toes because these unruly patrons will break out in fights! Can you keep the club bumping? 

Time to pop bottles and celebrate! 


 
 Game Features:
1.       Simple but addicting mechanics
Get the owner restrictions and just like your favorite dating apps, swipe left or right. The decisions are yours!

2.       Beautiful Graphics
This is one of the best looking club simulation games there is. Cute and funny animation for the unique customers.

3.       New Game Modes constantly getting added
Restrictions, fights, club mode there is so much more to come!

4.        Chill and have fun
No stresses of trying to look cool and get in the club. No rejection here. Just relax and swipe.

Meet unique people, decide who makes the cut and just remember, it’s your rules! 


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC

recentChanges: + Bug Fixes
comments: Yes, I know that it is a game that is not really that fun, but you know it gives you something to do and it makes you pay ALOT of attention! If you got the job it would probably be more boring in real life, so this game makes a very funnier and better version of this. So, just tell me that it is bad cause I will catch you lying!

This is a terrible game. Yes, some people might findit entertaining, but seriously? It's not fun, you need to watch a billion ads every second and yes, it's not pay to win, it is very annoying to always have to watch an ad every time you are supposed to work. I would NOT reccomend this to you.

The idea if it is fun. However, every lineup is extremely similar. It's usually let people in witch a certain color of shirt, 21+, and sober. I would have a lot more fun if it was harder. There's no brain work. A literal 4 year old could do this. Also, there are way too many ads! Like, I get it. It's necessary for most games to have ads but the average in this game is 3 ads every 1.5 minutes! It's exhausting! But seriously, make it harder and less ads and I would've kept this game on my phone...

I love this game a lot and its fun to play when ur board... BUT the only thing i hate is when i press to get my money ot wont let me and sometimes i have to restart the whole thing, but in the bright side is that it will let me swipe then it will make it like give me my money yo 😂😂🤡🤡 I love the game so much and its so fun to play when your boared (I DONT KNOW IF I SPELT THAT RIGHT SO DONT TAKE IT SOMEWHERE TO A NOTHER LEVEL IN OUTER SPACE) Lol thanks for reading till the end and yeahhhhhhh!

Pretty bad app. Design quite simple. I don't like the way it's shoves ads in your face. And to except a bribe you have to pay money? It's a sad excuse of a game. Tedious gameplay. 1 star would highly discourage you play.

title: Club Cooee - 3D Avatar, Chat, Party & Make Friends
description:
Club Cooee is a friendly and lively virtual world where you can make new friends. Club Cooee is a real social chat game with millions of users from all over the world. Chat, have fun and make friends: it's easy and free.

In Club Cooee you go with your 3D avatar to virtual 3D chat parties and get to know new friends easily and playfully. 

You create your 3D avatar with more than 500,000 crazy outfits. You'll be thrilled by the outfits other users have designed!

At a virtual chat party or a virtual concert, the latest music is always playing and of course, you can also be a DJ!

The shop offers the hottest dances and dance moves for your 3D avatar so that the party mood is perfect.

Thousands of virtual 3D chat rooms where you can party around the clock are waiting for you.

Create your own virtual 3D chat room and decide for yourself because you have the choice: inside, outside, on the beach, at home, day, night.

In our virtual world, you are never alone. Many have already found their great love with us, founded a virtual family or live their virtual life. Of course, you can also have a virtual date.

The built-in avatar chat helps you chat with your friends in a fun way: romantic dancing, hugging, kissing or just doing nonsense!

We are looking forward to seeing you! Install the free app now, design your 3D avatar and go to a virtual party!     

3D AVATAR CREATOR
• Create your 3D avatar with crazy outfits, tattoos, accessories, hairstyles, eye colors and more
• Choose from more than 500,000 apparel items and accessories
• Discover the crazy apparel and fashion items in the shops of other users
• Style your 3D avatar romantic, crazy, sweet, seductive, freaky, mysterious or however you want it to be

CHAT AND MEET NEW PEOPLE
• Chat with friends from all over the world
• Visit virtual parties and concerts and make new friends.
• Enjoy the virtual world where everything revolves around virtual parties and finding new friends
• Chat with friends and use 3D emojis to dance close together, hug or just do nonsense.
• Let your 3D avatar dance and show you who you are, who you like and who you belong to.
• Give small gifts from the wish list to draw attention to yourself and make new friends.
  
ROLEPLAY AND PARTY
• Move freely in the virtual world
• Go with your 3D avatar to the DJ booth and play your favorite YouTube songs
• Visit 3D chat rooms with Internet radio stations and interact live with the presenter.
• Raise your own virtual 3D music chat club and assign jobs to DJs, bouncers or dancers.
• Invite other 3D avatars into your personal virtual world for a house party, beach party or a romantic dinner or date.
• Found a virtual family and live your virtual life happily and carefree 

YOUR PROFILE
• Use your profile to draw people's attention to you
• Show crazy photos of your 3D avatar in your timeline and make new friends
• Keep your virtual family and circle of friends up to date

SOCIAL GAME
• Collect achievements, badges and rare objects
• Show what you've got in virtual 3D quiz rooms
• Climb the XP, DJ and Quiz Rankings
• Handle rare items on the built-in marketplace and make profits
 
Please note that Club Cooee is for ages 16+.
 
FOLLOW US
facebook.com/ClubCooeeEN/
instagram.com/clubcooee/
Twitter @clubcooee

title: Ubisoft Club
description:
Bring along your Ubisoft experience on your mobile to stay on top of your game at all times!

Get more from your games!
Take on more Challenges!
- Grind out more prizes and climb up leaderboards!
- Check the list of Classic Challenges and complete them to earn Club Units, Club XP and Badges
- Manage your Weekly Challenges directly from your mobile. All you need to do is find your game and add challenges from the challenge section. When a challenge has been completed, the “Collect” button lets you collect all related prizes and use them in game.

Access more Rewards!
- Get more than 700 exclusive items across 90 console and PC games! Club Rewards are exclusive in-game items, such as weapon skins, costumes, and consumables. All that cool stuff is only available in the Ubisoft Club! 
-  Find the best Rewards at a glance through color classification (Grey - Common, Blue - Rare, Purple - Epic, Orange - Legendary, and Black with gift icon - Exotic). Certain Rewards are free, others need to be redeemed with Units!
- Check all available Rewards for your games and get those you want directly from the App. Simply click on any game from your game collection, choose your Reward and click the ‘’Get’’ button. It will be added to your game.

Enjoy more benefits!
Meet Sam, your new Personal Gaming Assistant, only available in the Ubisoft Club App. It will take your gaming experience to a whole new level.
- Check our exclusive Daily Login feature to get stats, personalized tips, video guides and more! All of this powered by your in-game activities in Rainbow Six® Siege, Assassin's Creed® Odyssey, Tom Clancy's The Division™, Tom Clancy's The Division 2®, Far Cry® 5 and Ghost Recon® Wildlands.
- Ask Sam* anything you’d like to know about game stats or Ubisoft games! Just type your questions or use voice commands.
- Sam also provides useful shortcuts to support pages and the Ubisoft Store.

Enjoy a whole new social experience and real time updates!
- Celebrate your achievements together with your friends
- See  your friends' activities and latest updates from your games
- Get notified in real time when something important takes place such as Weekly Challenges, Special Events, and friend requests.

*Sam is in beta and available in English only.

UBISOFT MOBILE GAMES
38-42 rue Cuvier
93100 Montreuil Sous Bois
FRANCE
recentChanges:
Hello friends, welcome to version 6.0
The Club Team toiled hard to bring this new app experience:
• Improved performance, shorter loading times, rejoice!
• Offline mode for those "low on data" moments, it's okay we won't tell anyone
• Streamlined User Interface, get to your stuff faster
• Improved speech bubbles for SAM, come and chat
• Better focus on game stats and profile info
• Compare owned games, progress, and cool stats with friends
Enjoy it and give us feedback
comments: It's an ok app. Sam stopped talking to me when I login and has gone to just posting everything as text messages. Also SAM isn't very good at understanding anything when you try to ask a question. Only thing I like is the ease of collecting rewards for completing challenges

So far so good, but one of the major feature that I want to use, currently does not work! I'm talking about the friends list not being accessible. I'm able to send friend request to suggested friends from PlayStation Network, but beyond that I'm unable to access my Ubisoft friend list, normative anything else really.(under friends section) Resolve this, and concentrate on adding some more features...n this could easily be at 5 star app/companion! 🔨🤔🌐🗒️🖥️... 🤞🏻... 🤯👍🏻❗

After the update, "Sam" stopped working after the update, friends list won't even load and it's not taking my progress in the game accurately. This could easily be highly rated. But, the update made is worse off.

Great App! I love the gun skins that come with R6S and the renown I earn from completing challenges. I'd like to see more reward points offered frorn completing harder tasks or tasks that take longer to complete.

App was working fine until i have updated it today then the app won't launch anymore with the message : "Unfortunatly, ubisoft club has stopped." Tried solutions : clear cache ; clear data ; uninstall then install.

title: Ludo Club - Fun Dice Game
description:
Play Ludo online with friends and be a star - play LUDO CLUB!

This is the online multiplayer version of the epic hit board game Ludo! Join an exclusive club of star players in this premium dice game - be the best player, climb the ladders, collect all the special dice and become the KING OF LUDO!

Learn how to move your red, yellow, green or blue pieces with strategy and luck on best looking games board. Be the king of Ludo and become a star! Compete against other players and reach the top of the leaderboard! This is a fun game, a quick game, and a dice based board game that you can download and install for hours of fun and enjoyment!

Ludo Club has several exciting features. You can play this dice game with friends and family by sending Facebook and Whatsapp invites. Ludo CLub uses very little data and runs very smoothly on 2G, 3G, 4G! The app also includes support for offline play and vs Computer. You can also chat with other players on your games board! This game is very F2P friendly, you can win FREE coins using our Daily Bonus and Lucky Dice features to keep playing!

Looking for hours of non-stop enjoyment on your phone? Install Ludo Club and play everyone's favourite childhood board game from the developers of India's favourite games Teen Patti Gold and Baahubali. Ludo Club is available in loud, striking colours and beautiful board and dice designs for your phone's HD display. 

What are you waiting for? Let's roll the dice!

comments: This game is just a con. You will lose all of your money. This game will not give you any moves. Instead it gives your opponents every move they need to win. Game is not random as the game plays out the same way every time. And one note to moonfrog, answer our questions with actual answers instead of the same reply to every question!

It's an ok game but its fixed. When playing vs computer mode I can predict what number on the dice will come up and all of the time I'm right which to makes it an unfair game. Now I'm not saying I expect to win every game because I know it's not about winning but I think it needs to change to make it more fair. Apart from that it's a great game to pass on the time l.

Die is unfair . The outcome is predecided (not known buy user), it will let you win in beginning more and more so u become addicted to this game and spend more time on app. Later it make you win sometime or sometime not. Its is designed in way to spend more time on ludo. no one lost the first match, not in this game but in other ludo games too. This is not good.

This game is an absolute joke. I've played it for years now an it's just one big fix. I'm sick wasting my time building money to 50 thousand an not a hope can I win past this. I won once an never since. The game gives a certain player a win from the start of the game . Dice always rolls the exact number my opponent needs . I can read every game like a book. I'm deleting this game because it's not fairly played as much as I loved it I refuse to waste anymore time playing. Ridiculous to be honest

Game is good and fun.However it needs improvement with chat options and playing with friends.Chat should be available maybe at the bottom of the screen and made in a way that it doesnt interfere with a game.Its frustrating you have to open it in a new window and that sentence break after few words.Also we should be able to play with friends with other people in clas.mode not just among friend list but world wide.

title: Sam's Club
description:
Get more out of your membership on the Sam’s Club app.

The Sam’s Club app helps members save time and make the most of every shopping minute.  Find everything you need including shop online, Club Pickup, Scan and Go, pharmacy and free shipping for Plus members. Check out great prices and shopping discounts with Shocking Values and Instant Savings on wholesale items, and if you’re a Plus member, monitor your Cash Rewards. Let the tabs at the bottom of the screen move you easily between Home, Scan and Go, Account and More.

Scan and Go 
Beat the checkout lines with everyone’s favorite feature. Scan items as you shop, pay from the app and save time.

Access your membership card
Quickly find your membership card in your account. Easily pull up your club membership information.

Club Pickup
Shop online, schedule a free pickup time that works best for you, and we’ll have your groceries ready and loaded for you when you arrive.

Your Lists 
The easiest and most organized way to shop online. Easily reorder your favorite grocery shopping list directly from the app.

Pharmacy 
Save time. Refill and transfer your prescriptions right in the app and manage prescriptions for the whole family. It all adds up to a more convenient way to get your health needs covered.


Shipping
Shop and ship. Easily arrange to have your wholesale bulk items shipped to your home. Free shipping is available to our Plus members.

Download the app and get started saving today. 

Do Not Sell My Personal Information (Effective 1/1/2020)  
You can find instructions on how to submit a "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" request in the “What Are Your California Privacy Rights?” section of our Privacy Policy starting on January 1, 2020. https://corporate.samsclub.com/sams-club-privacy-policy
descriptionHTML:
Get more out of your membership on the Sam’s Club app.

The Sam’s Club app helps members save time and make the most of every shopping minute. Find everything you need including shop online, Club Pickup, Scan and Go, pharmacy and free shipping for Plus members. Check out great prices and shopping discounts with Shocking Values and Instant Savings on wholesale items, and if you’re a Plus member, monitor your Cash Rewards. Let the tabs at the bottom of the screen move you easily between Home, Scan and Go, Account and More.

Scan and Go
Beat the checkout lines with everyone’s favorite feature. Scan items as you shop, pay from the app and save time.

Access your membership card
Quickly find your membership card in your account. Easily pull up your club membership information.

Club Pickup
Shop online, schedule a free pickup time that works best for you, and we’ll have your groceries ready and loaded for you when you arrive.

Your Lists
The easiest and most organized way to shop online. Easily reorder your favorite grocery shopping list directly from the app.

Pharmacy
Save time. Refill and transfer your prescriptions right in the app and manage prescriptions for the whole family. It all adds up to a more convenient way to get your health needs covered.


Shipping
Shop and ship. Easily arrange to have your wholesale bulk items shipped to your home. Free shipping is available to our Plus members.

Download the app and get started saving today.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information (Effective 1/1/2020)
You can find instructions on how to submit a "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" request in the “What Are Your California Privacy Rights?” section of our Privacy Policy starting on January 1, 2020. https://corporate.samsclub.com/sams-club-privacy-policy
summary: Shopping & saving made easy.
recentChanges: We’ve made enhancements across the app to make things faster and easier – and cleaned up some bugs along the way.
comments: It gives me a big message about Coronavirus when I open the app, but it disappears before I can read it. It would be nice if the "Restricted Items in Cart" error message actually said which item(s) it had a problem with. "You have one or more restricted items in your cart. Restricted items can only be purchased at a register. Please remove them if you would like to checkout using Scan & Go" is a completely useless error message.

It is an exceptional tool, and another reason to rate Sam's above other "big box" stores! They also have an associate wipe down the carriages before you take one. They are doing everything they can to make sure your experience during these trying times are safe! So if you use, "Scan and Go," you are maximizing social distancing, and minimizing the danger of exposure.

This app is great and convenient for Scan and Go features as well as for looking as items online. The only problem I have is that when I order items to be shipped, the app omits my apartment number from the delivery information when I use my saved home address (which includes the apartment number). This causes issues with getting deliveries and some items have been sent back to the warehouse. Please fix this so I can place orders more seamlessly!

Before I wasn't, but now I'm experiencing a new issue. Why when I try to add a new card, why is the expiration date not giving me an option to select number 1 or manually input it? Every time I do, it automatically switch to number 11? This has been causing a lot of frustration. I love the no wait Express checkout this app offers. Until this is fix 2 stars it is.

The app was working well before today, 5 stars. But when I used today, the app caused the phone to shutdown ( screen went black and the phone was unresponsive) with every item scan. Lines were long, so I continued restarting the phone after each item scan and could finish the checkout process. Hope they fix the instability issues.

title: Club Life
description:
Gym Membership Management


Gym Check-In Management
Store your gym pass and check in at the front desk. No more need to put yet another item on your key ring.

Class Schedules
View current class schedules at your gym and reserve a spot as they become available. Can't make it? Cancel the reservation.

Earn Rewards
Refer a friend and earn points. Get enough points and earn exclusive rewards!

Book Appointments
Have a personal trainer or Group training? Book appointments with your trainer on the go! Need to cancel no more calling and trying to get a hold of them.

Feedback
Being heard is important and your feedback is valued. Submit feedback to your local gym and have it directly to those who can take action.

Social Media
Integrated Social Media so you can like and follow the activity of your local club.

recentChanges:
v2.7.9b148:
- Bug Fixes
comments: Memory hoggie for such a simple app. I can see class schedules which is terrible on my EFC gym's website with adobe downloads. This will tell you the current days schedule and the weeks ahead schedule right away. The notifications were too much and had to be shut down!! It should be an opt-in in the app instead of searching through the phone app interface mindlessly. Geez guys, maje itn user friendly.

I downloaded the app just now and the app tells me this version---that I just downloaded from Google Play---is no longer supported. I *just* downloaded it. I didn't even know that was possible.  ---  UPDATE: the developers contacted me almost immediately about an error on their part (tl;dr: a planned update for later this month was mistakenly entered as a planned update for this month last year, which then prompted users to update their app even as no update was yet available). That's super responsive customer service if I had ever seen it.

Registration process is terrible. New account created at the gym, however the app does not recognize my membership number. Updated: IT department contacted me within minutes of my review and corrected the registration issues. App now works fine.
Registration issues fixed. App works great. Great response time from IT department resolving issues as well.
constant updates, filters are not customized to set, lack of info o instructors or class

title: Nightclub Story™
description:
Get ready to open a pumping new nightclub packed with hip visitors dancing to your favorite Nightclub Story™ music! Design the dance floor and lighting, mix some drinks, then strategically place thumping speakers and unique posters on the wall to complete your nightclub nirvana. You can watch the clubbing faithful on the dance floor until the early hours, dancing to exclusive Nightclub Story™ in-game music or tunes from your own mp3 music library. 

- Design and build a nightclub with special lighting effects and hip decorations. 
- Choose songs from addictive in-game music tracks or your own mp3 music library. 
- Mix drinks on a variety of customizable bars. 
- Create the best dance floor around – it can be as big as the entire club so prepare to dance! 
- Visit your friends and dance at their clubs. 
- Simple and easy-to-use tap interface.
- FREE updates with new dance floors, décor, items and drinks every week! 
- It's FREE!

TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android, iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. 

Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.teamlava.com/terms and www.teamlava.com/privacy

Please note that NIGHTCLUB STORY™ is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money.  To delete this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option.  You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content".  In addition, NIGHTCLUB STORY™ may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

comments: All in this games are cool but we need more design like person coming to the club look so robot 😅 and dance floor is small amount of design. At outside the club u can build anything make it look a life. Example vip people coming with sport car and building around the club look nice and amazing view. If u update like that u can get more people play ur game. That time i will give u 5star for that update and more people support u we hope u can help us.

The games is a good game to play just like the restaurant and bakery the only difference is it has no goals to make it more interesting and it doesn't get anything new in it. This game hasn't been updated since July 28, 2014 why is that? Ya'll developers need to get off your butts and do better with this game. It didn't used to be like when it first came out and it shouldn't be like this now. Make updates just like you do with all your other games which I also play.

Good game but hate that ill save up thousands and thousands of coins and literally watch them deplete without buying or doing anything. This needs to be fixed. I shouldnt drop from 56,000 coins to 23,000 coins without buying anything. The game literally robs you of coins.

Iv played night club city (facebook's game). Actually i hope this game inspired from that game . And fyi, they got bonzer, booster for music, dj, bar tender. I hope u can develop this game more better than night club city

I love this game. I've always dreamt of owning my own club! My favorite part of the game is that you get to play music from your own library. I dont know if it's the fact that when the people walk in they smile because theres drinks or if they like my personal library music. I guess I'll be wondering that for awhile. :) Good work developers!!! ❤😊😊😊

title: Bingo Club
description:
Bingo Club is a free classic bingo game with lots of free Credits & Power-Ups every day! Join Bingo Club to play Bingo with millions of players around the world. Play in kinds of bingo rooms anytime, anywhere!

FEATURES 
* FREE daily gifts supply every day!
* 30+ unique game rooms with kinds of play styles and rewards!
* Go through the world bingo tour, unlock city rooms and WIN BIG!
* Get free Credits and Power-Ups every day!
* Complete daily tasks & WIN MORE!
* More events and festivals incoming!

Let's play now!

Please note:
An internet connection is required when you play Bingo Club.
Bingo Club is free to play, but you can make in-app purchases with real money.
Bingo Club does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.

recentChanges:
· New feature room!
· Christmas event is coming!
· Fixed some bugs.
comments: Addictive and fun! The graphics are amazing and the collections are great! You get many daily, weekly, and overall achievements that you cannot get bored. You get special collection sets you can collect and huge rewards for completing any set unlike other bingo games that only give you such a small reward that it doesn't even feel worth completing the sets! I 100% recommend to everyone!

I like the Bingo game but I think you should offer more power ups when you win the side games.. Power ups help win the games but you don't have a way to get them other than leveling up or winning 1 or 2 here & there.. Otherwise I like it so far.. Thanks

The game is really cool , it's in my top 10. but I give it 4 stars because it's makes the game that much more fun when u can add lil personalization to it, for example : Add bingo daubers, change of voice of the caller, etc.not saying all of these but just to name a few.
Best game I have played for this genre! Stunning graphics, wide selection of game themes, directional play, and multi-faceted elements to drive more competition and challenge. Just AWESOME!!!

Very fun game. It's challenging but not impossible to achieve goals. The extra bonus things you win keep the game entertaining. I seem to do better overall in Bingo Journey but this is definitely a fav free bingo game!!

title: Club CITGO
description:
Club CITGO puts convenience in the palm of your hand. This is your app for getting deals, earning rewards, and winning prizes at CITGO Gas Stations.

    Deals – Get instant mobile coupons and everyday deals at stores in your area
    Places – View details, amenities and find the closest CITGO location near you.
    Products – View details on products and find deals and rewards for your favorites.
    Rewards – You could earn mobile rewards for checking-in and sharing on Facebook and Twitter. Plus track your Club CITGO Loyalty Program (coming soon).
    Feedback – We value your feedback! Give in-app feedback directly to the people who make the decisions or email us at support@allpointsrewards.com.

But this app offers more than savings and free stuff. It’ll help you discover your next favorite restaurant or hotel. Or that roadside attraction the kids will always remember. Or that cup of late-night coffee just off the highway. We've made it easy to search, map, and learn—as well as save—all in the same app.

 We think you’ll enjoy it so much you’ll want to tell your friends—so we made it easy to share info on deals and rewards through Facebook, Twitter, and email. And every time you do, you just might win a prize!

Download Club CITGO today!

********************************************************************************
Note: Savings and reward content is available only at CITGO Gas Stations and Convenience stores that participate in the CITGO Mobile and rewards program. All stores may not provide all types of information, deals or rewards. We are adding more participating locations regularly.
********************************************************************************

CITGO Petroleum Corporation does not own, operate or maintain the retail locations bearing the CITGO logo, trade name and trade dress.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: It took a little teaching to learn how to use rewards but the staff at my favorite store was able to help me. They are awesome!
Love this app fun to collect points great dicounts!

This app used to be pretty good now it's become pretty much crapy, you used to give something on the holidays and you haven't done that in a long time, And most of the time your coupons expire before you get a chance to use them lately, Just not worth the effort much anymore
No root allowed. I just love when apps try to tell me how to use my phone. Uninstalled.

Most Citgo stations no longer honor the discount. Worse yet, if you check in it counts towards a monthly tracker, but not coupons. Only very few check-ins count for the coupons, and if you do the wrong one while traveling, you can't check in again for hours. Used to always get the $2 and sometimes $3 coupons. Now i can't seem to get the $1 except at one station 10 miles from my home. I once rated this app 5 stars, then 3, now 1. I've been a loyal Citgo customer for years.

title: Gear.Club - True Racing
description:
Gear.Club is much more than a quick adrenaline rush; it is an authentic world of cars. Realistic driving and racing experience, with fully simulated engines, powertrains, suspensions and aerodynamics. 

In this ultimate racing game, you will get to explore breathtaking settings and compete live with your online friends and foes through unlimited races, championships and events.  

Gear.Club offers a full range of options for the cars. Players can collect, upgrade and customize some of the most gorgeous exotic vehicles in their performance shop and enjoy details including engine and interiors in full HD.

FEATURES:

●	DRIVE with fully simulated engines, powertrains, suspensions and aerodynamics. Multiple control schemes are supported!
●	EXPLORE breathtaking race tracks and exotic locations.
●	RACE against your Friends through Events and Championships. 
●	CREATE and develop the ultimate Performance Shop to collect, upgrade and customize the most gorgeous exotic cars. 
●	ENGINEER specific parts to boost your machines beyond their maximum capacity. 
●	ADMIRE car details such as engines and interiors shown in Full HD!
●	COLLECT all your favorite cars.

PLEASE NOTE! Gear.Club is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

The file-size of Gear.Club is quite significant so make sure your Internet connection is stable when installing the game.
For this reason, the game asks for read/write access to your external storage  authorization to let you install the game on the storage of your choice.

Watch Gear.Club on https://www.youtube.com/c/EdenGamesOfficial

comments: I logged into my Facebook and it won't load now, and my signal,Wi-Fi, and storage on my device are full bars and more than enough space so what is happening EDIT: I did some testing, and it is only the loading screen that tells you about the world map, and that is the loading screen for getting into the game on my device, so I need this to be fixed please, because it really is a good game and I would hate to stop playing it over one little glitch

Awesome, but with issues. Here's the deal, this game is good! There are no useless mechanics like fuel, etc. But man, huge loading screens are everywhere! Also, there's too much texture tiling on the roads, and generally i think graphics needs improvement. I want to give 5 starts, and I'm ready to ignore the loading times, but graphics need to improve! Fix road texture please

Fabulous game but some races really made me confused between two words 'easy' & 'medium'. E.g- I'm stuck in the firtile valley race. The recommended Pl is 184, my car have 204 (BMW Z4), race status says it's 'easy', but no matter how good I drive I always have the 2nd & 3rd pos. Same thing happens with my Ford focus (PI 218) can't even beat another focus (PI 204) in calm reaver race no matter how much & how efficiently I try. Control glitches are another major problem of this game. Needs work.

Very bad gameplay :( Instead of player playing the game, the game is playing with player. Even fully upgraded still can't win, until the game decide to let you. Once you race an event, there's no same awards the second time you enter. Play and forgot, so no interest to collect cars and play again and again. One star for the stunning visuals, and one for the only one worthy to play future - the flash events.

It won't even let me choose the controls, it gave me a Xbox controller as the default control but I don't have one. title: Auto Club
description:
Auto Club App improves on-the-go access to trusted Auto Club services including membership, insurance, travel, and roadside assistance. This mobile version also shows members Cheapest Gas and Branch offices nearby.

Currently supported clubs in this app:
• Automobile Club of Southern California
• AAA Hawaii
• AAA New Mexico
• AAA Northern New England
• AAA Tidewater
• AAA TX
• Automobile Club of Missouri
• AAA Alabama
• AAA East Central
• AAA Northeast
• AAA Washington


Key features include:
• View membership details and insurance policies
• Pay bills for membership and insurance
• Request Roadside assistance
• Book hotel, flight, or rental card
• View upcoming trips
• Find cheapest gas prices near you
• Find member branch offices 
• Get an insurance quote for auto, home and other products (not available in all areas)
• Get instant battery replacement quotes (not available in all areas)
• Find Approved Auto Repair facilities

comments: This app deducts points for absolutely no reason. I have no negative marks since I've been using it for months. All of a sudden, my score goes from 99 down to 94. This app seems like it's rigged in favor of AAA regardless of how good your driving is. I have no accidents or tickets. What's the deal? It also doesn't properly record round trips. If you have a good rate, I wouldn't download this app. They will probably try to use it against you to raise your rate somehow. What a scam. *Sigh* Smh.

Worthless app as one can't login after repeated attempts (just like other raters report). It's been this way for a while. Even the counter personnel at my local AAA site acknowledge, when i queery them about the app, that it is a terrible app. I don't rate perform online ratings very often but i felt compelled to do this so other people don't waste time and phone space on this unusable app.

This is probably the worst app I've ever downloaded. I can go to my computer and login just fine, but as soon as i go to the app on my phone, the exact same login will not work. I've reset the password 5x and still it won't recognize my login. Absolutely worthless app.

App does what it's supposed, only problem for now it's the "hard braking", I read some answers and seems it count if you lose 20% of your speed in 1 sec. Their example was: "40 mph and go down to 32 mph in 1 sec". I'll recommend use the app on long trips, because in the city hard braking will be more often. They should have and option for that: If less than 35 mph and lose ±50% in less than 2 secs, anything below 40 mph should be more than 20% for being a hard braking. Just an opinion.

Surprised this has as high of an average ranking as it does. I agree with all the other bad reviews. Love AAA, and this has not changed that, but I agree the hard breaking doesn't consider traffic patterns and defensive driving, and promotes running yellow lights. I was taking a road to & from work that had a speed limit of 45-50 that traffic goes 70 on, and which has stop lights throughout it. Impossible for me to stop and go responsibly without hard breaking. Shouldn't even try those yellows.

title: Archery Club: PvP Multiplayer
description:
Archery Club is a multiplayer archery game with multiple exciting game types and an extensive upgrade system. Become a master archer, collect the best equipment and win against other people online!

FEATURES:
▶ REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER: Find and defeat opponents from around the world!
▶ EXCITING ARCHERY MATCHES: Each match consists of multiple game types!
▶ EXTENSIVE UPGRADE SYSTEM: Find new pieces to strengthen your bows!
▶ MULTIPLE DETAILED VENUES: Shoot your way to victory in different environments

Start your road to becoming an archery champion now! Archery Club lest you pick your favorite bow and play against other people online in exciting, multi-part matches! During each one of them you’ll play at least two out of three possible game modes:

Shortbow - a quick, 30-second long round where your reflexes and fast aiming skills will be put to the test.

Longbow - a longer round with 3 shots for each of the players. The distance to the target will increase after each shot, so you’ll have to be mindful of gravity and wind!

Compoundbow - a more strategic round, where you’ll have to decide which targets to shoot. Those that guarantee better score may be way harder to hit, so decide carefully!

Each match is played as a Best Of 3 with those game types selected in random order. You’ll have to master all of them if you want to keep winning and climbing up in the tanks!

You’ll duel against other people online in one of 4 distinct venues - forest, wild west, country, and university. Additional venues and game modes will be added to the game in future updates.

By winning matches against other people and increasing your skill you unlock new bow parts that you can use to further improve your chances of winning. Keep close attention to statistics of the bow you use and make them even more powerful with unlockable upgrades.

Download the game and try your skill in the best archery simulator on the market!

title: Romance Club - Stories I Play (with Choices)
description:
Welcome to Romance Club - a collection of romantic, episode based, story games where you make choices as you play. 

Ever dreamed of being a character in your favorite story? In this game you can...
✦ Customize your avatar and design your outfit
✦ Fall in love, romance and date cute guys and girls
✦ Develop relationships with your favorite characters - will they be friends or enemies?
✦ Make choices that can change your fate
✦ Immerse yourself in different worlds from love and drama to fantasy and adventure

What story will you choose first?

❖ MY HOLLYWOOD STORY - You're an aspiring actress pursuing dreams in a city known for destroying hopes and breaking hearts. Can you make the right choices on your path to the stardom? This romantic comedy story will appeal to any age.

✦ Season 2, episode 4, 5 & 6 coming in early April.

❖ MOONBORN - Can you save thousands of people from certain death and find the balance between light and darkness as you unravel the mystery of the prophecy of the "Moonborn"? This mystery vampire story will appeal to lovers of sexy urban fantasy. 

✦ Season 3, episode 3, 4 & 5 coming in early April.

❖ SAILS IN THE FOG - Helped by a group of rogue pirates, you must restore the honor of the family, take revenge on your enemies, and find a way to stop a mysterious Aztec curse. Love, pirates, and adventure meet together in this sweeping romantic tale.

✦ Season 4, episode 1 & 2 coming in early April.

❖ QUEEN IN 30 DAYS - A young student comes to a faraway kingdom to have a grand time, find love and become a part of the upper crust.

✦ Season 1, episode 9 & 10 coming in early April.

...PLUS more new stories and episodes coming soon!

PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF SERVICE
- Please read our privacy policy at 
http://yourstoryinteractive.com/privacy/
- By playing Romance Club, you agree to our terms of service
http://yourstoryinteractive.com/terms-of-use/

SHARE YOUR STORY
Like us on Facebook: https://goo.gl/TMkRZT

ABOUT US
Your Story Interactive is an independent game studio located in Chisinau, the capital of Moldova. Stories are our passion and storytelling is what we do. Our sims are free! If you like love stories with choices, graphic novels and cute guys, you'll love our games!

comments: This is a wonderful game,but I have 3 problems, first of all the diamonds is not enough I mean that if there is a good option it have diamonds, second, there is not enough tea I mean that if there was an important part of the story I used all of the tea, and the last thing that I am going to play the next part said to me (in development), but except that I like it very much, Oh! Another thing, I like moonborn and suduced by the rythem they are the most lovely stories to my heart, Thank you

This game is amazing. They have great story plot, many love interests, and realistic illustration. They also give you diamonds pretty generously and pretty reasonable cup of tea(tickets to play). What prevents me from rating 5 stars is, sometimes i pick options consistently that would lead me to one love interest and yet it keeps saying 'my relationship is not close enough w them' which would totally change the story plot(sometimes between life and death). Thats so frustating. Please fix it🙏🏽

Storries are good. Some of them capture your attention that you can't let go of it. It takes a lot of time to get new episodes when a story is in development. Two of the stories that I started, had to wait more than a month to get only two episodes and now need to wait again. But botttom line it is a good app.

I'm stuck at 46.88% in the first time loading screen Seduced By Rhythm ! This app needs to improve ! Characters, Environment & sometimes Background Musics are so Realistic that I feel myself present in the stories of this app ! & obviously stories are so interesting but there're just Few Stories available now ! You guys must bring more stories fast ! U guys need to work faster !

I wasn't expecting that this kind of games could be so exciting. Most of the stories are well written, characters are pretty realistic, and your choices do matter. The horror stories could evolve into a serious movies, that's for sure! Good job! And thanks for not robbing players by putting too little free opportunities.

Receive Club Communications through Push Notifications 
View Club News

title: ClubCorp
description:
ClubCorp Club Life

The Club Life app connects Members and guests with ClubCorp clubs across the country. With access to your club 24/7, staying connected is more convenient and easier than ever. Private club golf, dining, events and more are now just a click away.
 
The Club Life app allows Members at select clubs to:
 
• Make and manage your home club reservations including tee times, dining and events
• Stay in touch with the latest club news with messages from the club
• View your club calendar of events
• Access the club Member Directory and edit your Member profile
• View your statements and pay bills

Guests can also view information and amenities available at ClubCorp clubs, including hours of operation, driving directions, and contact information all through the ClubLife app.

We are rolling out the ClubLife app to our Clubs over a 90-day period. Not all Clubs are enabled at this time. If you have any questions, please check with your Club to see if the app has been enabled.

comments: This app is really terrible that something is not working properly all the time. Updated new release crahes whenever trying to make teatime reservation!!!
Does not work correctly on android phones.

Frequently Broken. The app itself is fairly slick and necessary to make tee times, but the maintenance is horrible. The app is frequently down where you either can't get to your info or make tee times (due to a variety of error messages) or you just can't even log in.

Worst experience. Only part that works is the billing section. When trying to book tee times it always responds with an error even when it does make the reservation. When attempting to view events nothing comes up.

As a usable app this is barely decent. You cannot get complete info on your tee time and the current statement billing doesn't match the online billing activity. Geez I hope someone's brother in law got paid for this.

title: The Club
description:
The Club is a rewards and loyalty program offering a variety of experiences and special privileges. You can join for free, regardless of whether you are an HKT customer.

Members earn Clubpoints when paying for certain services from various of HKT’s lines of business, or with our merchant partners. Once accumulated, Clubpoints can be redeemed for admission to events, as well as an array of products, services and privileges. These can include priority booking when buying concert tickets, air tickets, beverages and electronic gadgets, and when taking advantage of hotel offers.
 
Hong Kong Telecommunications (HKT) Ltd is a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands with limited liability.

What a load of sbsolute rubbish. I get messages that this app has stopped before I have even started it, and when I do start it, I get a messages that it has stopped. Desktop access works okay, otherwise one would be unable to access one's account. I wonder why HKT is so unprofessional, publishing an app like this.

Too many advertisements that interrupt my work.  Send me fewer messages.  Rewards and bargains are for the users' "down time".  You are bothering me too much during my work time.  I have no choice but to disable ALL notifications from this annoying App, regardless of what offers you have.
Rubbish app! Always showing the password format is incorrect but the same password I can log in on the web.
stuck at id verification, no matter how many times i try it returns to me login screen

title: BJ's Wholesale Club
description:
The BJ’s App has everything you need to make the most of your Membership. Enter In-Club Mode when you visit a Club to access that location’s helpful mobile features.
 
•	Add-to-Card Coupons
o	Browse and add coupons directly to your Membership Card (no scissors required). Your clipped savings will be applied automatically at checkout.
 
•	BJ's Gas® 
o	Check BJ's Gas regular and premium gas prices for any location -- so you can pump up the savings and fill up for less.
 
•	Find-a-Club
o	Get directions, Club hours, Club features, BJ’s Tire Center hours and Optical Department information for the Club nearest you.
 
•	 Deli Pre-Order
o	Pre-order BJ’s deli items and platters straight from the app. (Available in select clubs only.)
 
•	Free In-Club Pickup
o	Let us do the shopping for you. Place an order for pickup in just 2 hours.*
 
•	ExpressPay
o	No need to wait in a checkout line. Easily shop, scan your item’s barcode, pay within the app, and go! (Available in select clubs only.)
 
•	BJ’s Stocked
o	Get select items shipped to your home in 2 days with BJ’s Stocked.
 
•	Same-Day Delivery
o	Get Same-Day Grocery Delivery on select items in as little as 2 hours.
 
•	Featured Recipes
o	Browse recipes, view videos, shop ingredients and add them directly to your Same-Day Delivery cart.
 
•	Reload
o	View the products you've recently purchased in-Club or via Same-Day Delivery and easily Reload them to your cart. 
 
•	Access Membership Information
o	One-click access to all your Membership details, My Rewards, order history, track challenges or scan your Membership card. 

*Orders placed 2 hours prior to Club closing or later will be available our next business day. Visit BJs.com/PickUp for details.

comments: The back button takes you all the way back to the home page, rather than just back one page (system back button and in-app back button). App pushes notifications advertising discount/offer codes that have expired. Browsing requires both horizontal and vertical scrolling. Overall a very poor interface and experience, but the app is otherwise functional.

So the scanning has been added, yay But it's also kinda time consuming to look through the coupons while shopping. And doing it before hand does help, but then you risk missing some. If maybe there was a way to have your fav brands already selected or marked so we dont have to clip the same coupons each time. Itll save time and at the same time I can look for new coupons

Edited: Customer care was great. Problem with the app getting confused with old and new emails. They worked it out. App still has some quirks. Scanned an item several times and entered the bar code several times. App said item not found. Scanned it again and it finally worked. No idea why....The express pay was great though. Lines to the back of the store and I paid in the app and walked right out!

I have the same issue with the app as others that have the app open by itself when first unlocking my phone. It happens randomly throughout the day and it's very annoying. I like the app for adding coupons but if you don't fix this I will also be uninstalling the app. This issue was resolved a long time ago. The app works great now.

Stable app. Auto in-club mode is a great feature. Especially the ability to checkout if buying less than 15 items and under $500. It was a true life saver on the first day after state of emergency was declared in NJ.

title: Centennial Gun Club
description: Centennial Gun Club is a Country Club with Guns. It was designed from the ground up to be a unique gun store, shooting range and training facility unlike any in the country. EQUIP  PREPARE  PRACTICE is our motto; we believe that having the right equipment, receiving outstanding training and regular practice on the range are the keys to skill at arms. Centennial Gun Club brings all these elements together in one location.

great staff, friendly and helpful. classes are informational and spot on training

title: GT: Speed Club - Drag Racing / CSR Race Car Game
description:
We believe in the accelerator, not in brakes. A different experience from a free racing game in the Drag racing style. This time with "GT: Speed Club".

Note: "After installing the game, about 45 megabytes of data will be downloaded"

GT Club includes tons of race cars with stunning quality that you have never experienced in any of drag racing games. Drag racing is a type of car driving game in which you focus more on improving your car and changing gears on time, instead of car steering.

 There's more:

◀ ️ More than 65 cars - both high-end and nostalgic ones (and more on the way)

◀ Simulation of driving physics and the racing according to reality (test to find out)

◀ Variety and cool personalization. Decorate your car according to your personality

◀ Fiction section and competition with 20 characters from different neighbourhoods 

◄ Variety of tournaments ---> Free / Stairs / Knockouts / Daily / Class Eats ...... 

◀ Applicable at the right performance, even on weak phones (below 1 GB)

◀ ️Simple, beautiful and attractive interface 

 
From recent user reviews:

"Better thAn CSR"
     - Player Name: Andrew Mattinson

"Graphics are awesome!"
     - Player Name: Brett Barbo 

Contact Us

If you have any suggestions to improve the game or have any problems, please contact us by telegram or email :

◀ Email support: support@kingcodestudio.com

◀ Our telegram support: @GTclubAdmin (https://telegram.me/GTclubAdmin)

You can follow the game's updates and headlines below

◀ ️ Telegram Channel:  @gt_club_game (https://telegram.me/gt_club_game)

◀ ️ Instagram Channel:  https://instagram.com/gt.club.game

title: Pitchero Club
description:
Over 10,000 sports clubs use Pitchero across the globe. 

Find your club on the new Pitchero Club App and you'll never miss a thing, from the latest results, league tables and team chat! 

Whether you are a player, parent, coach or a supporter, the Pitchero Club App has everything you need to follow your club on the go.

*********************

YOUR CLUB YOUR WAY!  

Customise your home screen experience by following the teams that matter the most to you. 

Follow up to three teams and your home screen will display the latest fixtures, results and news from just those teams, along with any important club news. 

The new menu means you can access all teams quickly and easily. Each team has a dedicated page so you have all the information you need at your fingertips.

CAN YOU PLAY?  

Pitchero Club is perfect for players! Let your coach or manager know your availability in seconds with the new Schedule feature.

Your Schedule is customised for you, allowing you to respond to any availability requests or to confirm your match day selection.

CHAT WITH YOUR TEAM!

Pitchero Club has its own built-in messaging system so you can chat with your teammates about games, training, club news and events. You can even set up group chats for your team so no-one is ever stuck for a lift to the game!

DID THEY WIN?

Missed a game or want to know the result? We’ve got you covered! You’ll find full fixture lists for every team and all the latest match reports, photos and videos as soon as they are posted online.

MORE THAN ONE CLUB?

If you play for, or support, more than one club then simply add them to your Account and switch between clubs quickly and easily.

CHAT WITH YOUR TEAM!

Pitchero Club has its own built-in messaging system so you can chat with your teammates about games, training, club news and events. You can even set up group chats for your team so no-one is ever stuck for a lift to the game!

DID THEY WIN?

Missed a game or want to know the result? We’ve got you covered! You’ll find full fixture lists for every team and all the latest match reports, photos and videos as soon as they are posted online.

MORE THAN ONE CLUB?

If you play for, or support, more than one club then simply add them to your Account and switch between clubs quickly and easily.
summary: Never miss a game with the Pitchero Club app!
recentChanges: We’ve fixed some bugs and made it possible to view your promoted content in the app
comments: Notifications often do not load. Deleted fixture still appears. Calendar export should include the location details and meet time (rather than kick off time). Show man of the match event to players in the overview and highlights. Integration with mitoo, all that data automatically feeding in will boost traffic for your ads :)

This app is terrific. Its been instrumental in helping me to keep organised as a player with my club. Its also been really beneficial for my club to use it as a platform for organising events. I can heartily recommend this to anyone.

I'm not really sure how this app is treated so highly. I use it for my children because that's what their sports clubs have chosen and the basics are in place, but: • It's really slow to load • Once the app has loaded, further levels still take ages • The user interface is clunky at best • The graphics / UI clash • Options previously submitted aren't displayed, rather a blank set • I could go on Conclusion: Idea good, execution had

Not a great app. Better than managing teams via email and WhatsApp but only just. Incredibly slow to open, with some really frustrating aspects such as not showing recent messages (I can see the updates on the email notification but not in that app).

Why can see all the names for a Game Fixture selected and for an event but where people want to see who is coming publicly for training attendees this is forced to be hidden with no options to allow team to see the list like it would for a published game. It means cluttered match fixtures with tramping fixtures so admin can then allow people to see so much more use is admin sets oubkic or private list view if training dates

title: Jean's Club
description:
Jean start new business, managing club after the big hits of Jean's Boutique Fashion.

Serve customers as fast as you can to keep them happy.
If the customers wait for too long, they get angry and eventually leave the club.
Clean! Dance! Music!

Challenge to the best club through upgrade and employee.

▣ Gameplay Concept
▷ The more customer's satisfaction is high, the more tip you earn.
▷ If the customers wait for too long, they get angry and eventually leave the club.
▷ You will get random rewards to clear the stage with higher score.
▷ You will get many rewards to beat a challenge.
▷ The employee help you to run a club.
▷ Use items and upgrade for getting the higher rating.
▷ Do not forget to clean the dance stages.

▣ Features
▷ 10 clubs with 10 levels to beat in each club.
▷ Various useful items to help you with running the club.
▷ Inviting friends and sharing the game reward you in various ways.
▷ Opening a new club the game reward you in various ways.

comments: I don't like that the club is already decorated for you, all you do is move the customers to what they are requesting. Example if they want a drink you just move them to the bar and the drinks are already made for you you just gotta click the drink with highest star rating. It gets boring after a while.
It gets boring after awhile but the game is fun. I have all pwrfect scores and still donf have the rating of 60% needed to move forward. Wish you could earn coins faster

Can't get 3 stars upgrades to expensive can't move on after level 10 
without 10000 and 500 jewels this game sucks
Nice
My hearts never refill the timer is always stuck on 15 minutes I keep reporting this problem but its never fixed

title: Word Club
description: Word Club is the Scripps National Spelling Bee’s premier spelling bee preparation tool. With Word Club, your child can have fun while mastering the 2020 School Spelling Bee Study List and Words of the Champions – the official study words for 2019-2020 classroom, school, district and regional spelling bees. This all new study format adapts to different study and quiz styles, with added game-play features to keep your spelling champ motivated. With difficulty levels ranging from beginning (One Bee) to advanced (Three Bee), Word Club provides a challenge for spellers at all levels. Word Club is the exciting new way for kids to learn the words they need to succeed, in spelling bees and in life! Download the app free today and get 50 free words from the 2020 School Spelling Bee Study List. Study and quiz styles include flash cards, fill-in-the-blank, match the vowels, multiple choice and more. Use built-in tools to track progress as your child becomes a spelling and vocabulary superstar!

312 Walnut St. Suite 2800
Cincinnati, OH 45202
recentChanges:
Added ability to bookmark missed words
Fixed issue where sometimes pronunciations stopped working.
Other bug fixes and enhancements
comments: It is a ok app to learn, but the constant lagging and crashing does get intolerable. I paid to buy every pack, and i can tell you that the prices can get steep, and when you click the pronounce button, it almost never works. Only 14/15 words per pack even seem to work. NOT COOL SCRIPPS. Make the pronunciation button actually usable or I will not be using this next year or buying any products. NOT RECOMMENDED!!

I almost didn't purchase the app because of the negative reviews, but we decided to give it a try anyway. It works great! By far the best way we've found for my daughter to study for the spelling bee. We purchased an the word sets, and each set includes definitions, language of origin, pronunciation, and the word used in a sentence, as well as multiple ways to study and practice.

I came here to access the school lists, no luck. Interface is very confusing. I wish Scripps would stick to the computer version, and not completely terminate it and replace it with an app. And if you get this app, you have to spend $25 to unlock all word packs, if you want to not spend much, I would recommend looking at old word lists. For new spellers though, have $25 ready.👎

This is a great app! I bought the $25 pack, wondering if it would be worth it, and it really is! I don't have to doubt pronunciations because Dr. Jacques Bailly is pronouncing them. I have all the resources: definition, language of origin, and part of speech. Yay! One thing I would recommend is for the pronunciations to automatically play once you get to the next word. I feel like that would save time, and if you didnt hear it the first time, you can click the button. Thanks again for this app!❤
Didn't have any problem till now. Just that would have been better if the pronunciation was not showing for every word. It is quite distracting. It should have been on demand like the other features.

title: Rummy Club
description:
Do you enjoy playing Rummycube, Okey 101, Canasta, Belote or Gin Rummy? You will find that Rummy Club combines best elements of them all and improves upon it. Unlike those other games, Rummy has the right combination of luck, your skills, and intelligence while keeping that magic Casino feel! Rummy Club is the best board game ever made by Ahoy Games, creators of the most popular Turkish board game: Okey.

Rummy Club is an offline, tile-based rummy game, where you can challenge yourself and develop your skills and intellect! Rummy Club allows manipulation of all tiles on the table placed by players, this gives you unlimited move possibilities.

Features:
● Bet big, earn billions and become the King of the Casino.
● 8 different City Themed bet rooms (Rio, Moscow, Istanbul, Bombay, London, Las Vegas, Paris, and Dubai)
● Breathtaking 3D graphics (including 3d main menu and 3d tiles)
● 8 unique opponents to play against
● Stunning animations
● Spectacular effects
● Carefully crafted Tutorial
● Leave and resume the game at a later time
● Exceptional Rummy AI engine
● No time pressure
● Play without needing an internet connection (offline)
● No need to wait for slow and disturbing players
● Free to play
● Challenge mode
● Supports 7 languages

You can enjoy Rummy Club wherever you are, without requiring an internet connection! Our excellent AI engine will always keep things interesting yet challenging. No matter if you are a beginner or an advanced player, we have many city themed rooms for every difficulty level!

With a great tutorial, you can quickly learn the game's rules and start enjoying Rummy Club.

Thank you very much for your support!!

02-703

recentChanges: Many improvements and bug fixes 😍
comments: Great BUT... What is the point of continuing to play if eventually I can't win anymore? Like, ever. I'm at level 18 and now when I play, all the other players can lay an initial hand WAY before I can, and I only have maybe, 2 turns to try and win. What the heck? Now it's no fun because it's TOO hard. Why play anymore.

Once you start high rolling and betting 1m+ the game keep you from melding until you have 20 or more tiles. The NPCs end up playing out before you can even play a tile. I have played Rummikub for 30 years and I have seen a 25 tile hand less than ten times. In two days I've had 10. Pay-to-play garbage. EDIT: I'm not updating my review score. You can sit with a single-star rating from me. I played the game some more to see if the odds were stacked against me. Lo-and-behold! If, in any "city" that you play in, you bet more than half of the maximum possible bet it is 62% less likely that you win and that you will be dealt with tiles that prevent you from melding for the first 5-10 turns. I will reiterate. Pay-to-play garbage. The game is designed to punish people who "bet big" and go for it, attempting to coerce them into buying more chips to continue playing. The starting bet is always over the halfway mark (in Dubai, for example, the auto-bet is 2.6 million where the maximum is 5 million).

Fun, until you get to higher levels. Then to keep you from progressing you end up drawing and waiting to pull tiles enough to play, watching the other players play out after you finally get top lay your starter hand. About to delete, just annoying. You're playing against a computer, give me a break!

Looooong ads. Good game, but it seems to go through long cycles where I am very often the last player on the board, If I get on at all. Or I finally get in the game, but then it ends before I get a turn... This gets really BORING. Tap, wait, tap wait, tap, wait, tap, wait, tap, wait, tap, wait, tap, wait...... Sigh 😞 My win rate is 57% and I am working my way up to 5 billion coins. Yes, billion! I have played 847 games.

I used to play this as a board game when I was younger and i loved it. I was so pleased when i found it on line. But it is frustrating when they want me to pay real money for stupid chips, I wont do that!

title: ROSSMANN CLUB
description:
Stáhněte si nejnovější aplikaci sítě drogerií ROSSMANN a staňte se členy věrnostního klubu. S novou mobilní aplikací ROSSMANN CLUB získáte mnoho slev a výhod. Sbírejte body za nákupy a vyměňte je za exkluzivní bonusy. Díky výhodám pro členy ROSSMANN CLUBu se už při nakupování vašich oblíbených produktů nemusíte omezovat.

* Získejte zákaznickou kartu v mobilu a s ní i speciální slevy a bonusy.
* Jako člen ROSSMANN CLUBu obdržíte uvítací kupon s 20% slevou za registraci, věrnostní kupon a narozeninový kupon.
* Využijte slevy z dětského programu Rossmánek.
* Mějte přehled o aktuálních slevách z letáku.
* Inspirujte se ROSSMANN tipy na líčení a trendy zdravého životního stylu.
* Informace o všech prodejnách ROSSMANN mějte vždy po ruce.
* Kartu v aplikaci můžete využít i bez připojení k internetu.

Nice app 👍👌👍
Good

Těšila jsem se na bezva akce a jednoduchost v aplikaci. Bohužel při každém nákupu mi to při zapnutí aplikace hodí chybu a odhlásí. A zadávejte se s přihlašovacími údaji, když za vámi čekají další lidé a paní na kase. A minimálně dalším dvěma přátelům se děje to samé...

title: Sam's Club now
description:
Sam’s Club now (available for Lower Greenville Texas club only)

Same great prices, more convenience. Download the app, scan as you shop, show the QR code on your way out. Quickly in – quickly out.

How it works:
1.    Download the Sam’s Club now app.
2.    Visit the Lower Greenville club at 2218 Greenville Ave, Dallas, TX 75206.
3.    Quickly scan as you shop.
4.    Easily add your payment card to pay. We accept all cards – no cash needed (or accepted).
5.    Show the QR code to the associate at the door.

Save time on your shopping at the Sam’s Club Lower Greenville club. Find low prices on bulk items and quick meals for the family.

•    No checkout lines: Use the app to scan, pay, and go – just show your QR code to the associate at the door
•    Find items quickly: We’ll show you the shortest way to get there
•    Grab & go meals: Get fresh sushi, salad and more easy meals…to go

What’s new
Everything! We are rolling this out for the Lower Greenville club only. Come by and try it out!

Horrible experience. I cannot use this app with my network. I do not want to use the Sam'sClub insecure wifi.
wont let me update membership number. Super long lines instore

Horrible, used to use the scan and go app but looks like they discontinued and moved us to this one...have tried this so many times over the past 8 weeks and will not recognize me in the store...even though I'm connected to Sam's Club Wifi!! Such a waste of phone space and my time!! 😡
I love this app, just scan your item's then swipe to pay then you just head out the door while the rest are waiting in line to check out.

title: Nike Training Club - Workouts & Fitness Guidance
description:
Nike Training Club is your Ultimate Personal Trainer. Get fit with free workouts from strength and endurance to mobility and yoga — featuring world-class Nike Master Trainers in every exercise & drill. Workout anytime, anywhere, and track all your activity in the app. From bodyweight exercises to full-equipment exercises, discover personalized workout recommendations, just for you.

FIND WORKOUTS FOR ALL LEVELS
The Nike Training Club workout library includes:
• Body-part focused workouts targeting your abs, arms, shoulders, glutes, and legs 
• Strength, endurance, yoga, and mobility workouts
• Workout times ranging from 15-45 Minutes
• Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced Levels
• Low, Moderate and High Intensity
• Bodyweight only, Light and Full Equipment
• Time-based and Rep-based options

GET GUIDANCE TO REACH YOUR GOALS 
Workout Collections offer a set of recommended workouts and guidance from our Nike Trainers and some of your favorite athletes, including Isaiah Thomas, Julie Ertz, Sydney Leroux Dwyer, and Cristiano Ronaldo. Stay focused on your routine, get tips and guidance from our athletes and trainers, and reach your fitness goals with Workout Collections like:
• Get Leaner Stronger Abs
• Always Ready For the Beach
• 6-Week Guide to Get Lean, and more

WORKOUT ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Nike Training Club members love our short, bodyweight only workouts to get the results they want even when life gets in the way. 

DISCOVER PERSONALIZED WORKOUT RECOMMENDATIONS
Our daily “Picks For You” are based specifically on your routine. The more you train with Nike Training Club, the more personal your recommendations become.

ALL YOUR ACTIVITIES COUNT
Enter and record other activities and exercises you do, like basketball, spinning, studio classes, and many more, all so you can keep track of your fitness life. 

And don’t forget — Nike Training Club also syncs your workouts with Google Fit.

TRACK YOUR RUNS
Run with Nike Run Club, and all your runs will be automatically recorded in your activity history.

__________________________

NIKE TRAINING CLUB PREMIUM
Reaching your fitness goals just got easier. We’ve partnered with world renowned Nike Master Trainers to deliver their results-focused workouts and programs, straight to you. Subscribe now and get a 7-day free trial to access: 
• 4-6 Week Programs Led by Nike Master Trainers 
• Expert Nutrition & Wellness Guidance Including Mindset, Recovery, and Sleep
• New Workout Formats Including On-Demand Classes and Whiteboard Workouts for Gym-style Training


SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
The cost of an NTC Premium subscription (after any free trials) is $14.99 per month (annual subscription is $119.99). Payments will be charged to your Google Play account. Your subscription renews Monthly or Annually (depending on the plan selected) and your Google Play account will be charged for each renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. Cancel at any time by going into Google Play Subscription Center. To avoid auto-renew charges, cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial (if any) or the current subscription period. By subscribing to NTC Premium, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Refunds on subscriptions to NTC Premium are subject to the Google Play Store policy. Subscriptions to NTC Premium are non-refundable and there is no right to refunds or credits unless required by applicable law or as otherwise permitted by the Google Play Store policy.

Greatness is trained. Come train with us and download Nike Training Club today.

Boost Your Mood - Upbeat workouts from speedy HIT sessions to relaxing sun salutations.

And, like any athlete, we’re always focused on improvements to maximize our performance.
comments: Fantastic content, but terrible app. It's just has so many bugs. Biggest issues at the moment is the app won't let me un-save a workout, meaning I can't pre-plan the weeks workouts. Also, if I go into my feed, down to the It's time to move post from yourselves, and click join now, I get a new home screen with tabs such as 'expert tips', but if I go anywhere else the app and come back to workouts, it reverts to the standard 4 tabs. Please help

Beyond EXCEPTIONAL! We have been using this app off and on for the past 6 months or so and never wanted to pay for premium and during the COVID-19 pandemic they amazingly made premium available for free to everyone! It has been such an incredible relief to not only have a way to workout but to try new workouts and experience the premium membership during this time of uncertainty. I will always remember the considerate and supportive measures Nike took. Thank you!!!

Uses to absolutely love this app, but recently has been EXTREMELY glitchy to the point where I can barely even use it at all out of frustration. Updating my workout plan doesn't work, or doesn't save and prompts me every single time I go into my weekly schedule. Also won't let me edit my week, also doesn't save my workouts/progress. I was 2 weeks into a plan and all the sudden it just disappeared and I had to start all over, the videos are out of sync. Won't be using until fixed!

It's a great resource but the music thing is annoying. It does not recognize google play as my default music player and does not integrate my playlists... I can not play my music through the nike training club and thus miss built in features otherwise advertised...
Always easy to follow instructions. Loving the premium content and the trainers. I love learning new moves and stretches and this app definitely teaches you that no matter your skill level.

title: Tuning Club Online
descriptionHTML:
Tuning Club Online is a unique racing game in real time via the network. Stop racing the rival ghosts or bots. Build your car, fight with friends and rivals around the world.

VARIETY OF MODES

- Have a free ride and chat with friends;
- Push maximum power in the speed race;
- Leave smoking trails on the track in drift mode;
- Fight for the crown in crown hold mode;
- Don’t let anyone catch you up in a bomb mode;

ARCADE

- Pick up boosters on the levels to slow down your opponents, earn money, get nitro, pick up the crown or arrange a real bombardment;

VISUAL TUNING

- Put bumpers, body kits, hoods, spoilers, apply vinyls or skins, choose tires and wheels;
- Create your own unique style with skins, cop lights, clown heads, crazy tailpipes and more;

ENGINE TUNING

- Build an engine to fit your playing style;
- Combine rare details and their unique qualities;
- Put the piston, crankshaft, camshaft, flywheel and other parts;

E36, RX7, Skyline, Evolution - and this is just the beginning of the list of legendary cars for tuning in this multiplayer game. Over a million combinations are there to bring your ideas to life. Gather your collection of cars and their parts to become the champion in the arena.
summary: Real multiplayer game for 10 players, arcade modes and full car tuning

Unrealistic top speed. Even max upgrade wont make you reach realistic top speed (stock vehicle's top speed in real life) You'll rarely find players online, hence you won't be able to get cases to upgrade your vehicle too. I also can't comprehend why buffing the top speed to make it realistic makes the game boring. This is like a Ferrari that has a top speed of Prius, what's the point of having a decent looks if the performance is terrible. Forza has realistic stock top speed, and still tunable.
Greatest game i never played it has awesome graphics, great controls, and more. Keep up the good work and btw the two headed shark it crashes on my fire 7 tablet so can you fix this. 😎👌
Excellent graphics but physics could be way better. They need to be more realistic.

Not bad graphics are really good but the physics of drifting need to be highly improved fix this issue and you'll have am awesome game especially having controller compatiblity I'll change it to 5 star if you fix this

title: Bay Club Connect
description:
Bay Club Connect is your one-stop member app where you can pay your bill online, see updated account information, and more. 
No need to stop by the front desk, you can do everything necessary wherever you are

Once you are logged in, you can check out the following features:
Dashboard: This is where you can find your general information like your name, member ID, current balance and last statement of your billing account, as well as your lifestyle points.
Profile: Click on this tab to view and change your contact info and billing info.
Billing Account: This tab will show you your current balance and statement details.

comments: Similar issues to those mentioned in other reviews. After using for 3 months the app logged me out and the login screen is frozen. Tried clearing cache, uninstalling and reinstalling, etc. Spoke to customer service and the response which they conveyed from the app developer was that "it must be a problem with my phone". Very professional and productive (sarcasm). FYI, this app was developed in-house (Bay Club employee) and not by a professional developer so that explains a lot.
The app is frustratingly slow. Especially when you switch from cell data to wifi and continuously logs out the time. For the class of club, Bay is, I would have expected a much better app experience.
never able to get it connected to network and use. Hundreds of other apps of mine dont have the issue. Edit: half year passed by and issues remain the same. EXCELLENT!

Locks up about once a week. Makes me re-signin often. You know it's sub-par when people at the front desk tell you things like "just take a screenshot of your check-in bar code so that you don't have to use the app"
Love it. Don't have to carry my card. Can look up all my billing info and points, etc. Also nice interface for looking and signing up for classes.
