title: Darts Club: PvP Multiplayer
description:
Darts Club is a PvP multiplayer game with a collectible twist!😃 Increase your darts skills, collect new pieces to 💪upgrade your darts💪 and take on players from around the world!😃

Features:
💥 PvP MULTIPLAYER: Find and defeat 👊 opponents from around the world!
💥 INTRICATE UPGRADE SYSTEM: Find new pieces to strengthen your darts!
💥 MULTIPLE DETAILED VENUES: Unlock 🔑 them by advancing in the ranks
💥 SPECIAL EVENTS & MORE: Discover surprises we’ve planned for the future!

Compete against other people online in this uniquely involving Darts game! Learn to throw your dart efficiently and precisely, master your skills and become a 💥Worldwide Dart Champion!💥

By playing the game and winning matches you 🔑unlock new pieces🔑 and can use them to 😃customize your darts!😃 With new barrels, shafts and flights your darts will get a unique look and a performance boost in 😆multiplayer PvP clash!😆

As your equipment becomes better, so do your chances of winning, but the deciding factor will still be 💥your skill💥. Even the best darts won’t help you if you don’t master the art of throwing them! 

The more you play Darts, the better you’ll be able to anticipate where the dart lands when you throw it. Don't give up, discover your inner Dart Champion and 👊dominate👊 the multiplayer PvP online arena!

title: MyClubConnect - Night Club Events Finder
description:
Whether it’s what’s on in London, clubs in Birmingham, Manchester nightclubs, Birmingham nightclubs or nightclubs in Liverpool, we don’t care - we help you Own The Night wherever! With the MCC app, we have brought the best of UK nightlife for you to easily navigate what’s on in your town with all the features that you could ever need.

It has always been difficult to find out what’s on at UK nightclubs. It’s even harder to find club events that are perfect for your night club music taste; club events near you, that are not too far from the bar you’re at and that are perfect for your big night out! You need a night club finder and events app that allows you to easily navigate UK nightlife without spending your night out just researching what’s on near you all night. That’s exactly what MyClubConnect allows you to do!

What does MyClubConnect offer?

Find and compare exciting UK night club events near you at the UK’s best night clubs 
Filter club events by a variety of filters including club music policy, dress code, end time and more
View nights out on a map or nightclub events list, with a changeable radius and events up to 3 months in advance
Buy tickets for your preferred UK nights out and use promo codes from your favourite night clubs and promoters for discounted and exclusive entries
Fill the party planner role much easier by planning your night out with your friends using our Friends Pick and come to a group decision on which club event to attend
Get rewarded for going to club events by earning MCC Points in-app to spend on MCC Rewards like Free Nightclub Entries

MyClubConnect are nightlife experts with night club partners across the UK club scene. It doesn’t matter where you are, MyClubConnect has a club event near you! It’s a London Club Guide, it’s a party guide for Brighton nightclubs, its a blueprint to Leeds nightlife, it’s a club events encyclopaedia for Bristol nightlife as well as a Birmingham night out treasure trove! We are very proud to provide the easiest way to find out what's on near you, with more UK night club events than any other platform! 

The MyClubConnect app is FREE and will forever be FREE to you clubbers - so what are you waiting for? Get out there and let us guide you to an amazing night out at a club event near you!

https://myclubconnect.events | social@myclubconnect.events
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/myclubconnect
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_myclubconnect
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_myclubconnect
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7_MZ_UtYuhVgoyEME3S51w

If you do enjoy the app and have had a great night out thanks to MyClubConnect, do leave us a review - it helps more than you can imagine. Thanks!

title: Club Soccer Director 2020 - Soccer Club Manager
description:
Take control of a Real Soccer Club in Club Soccer Director 2020

This is the game that puts you in charge of the whole club. Create the club the way you want it, set the club philosophy and hire the manager and his team to play the way you want.

Handle all the player recruitment, dealing with difficult agents and managing the budgets to build a squad capable of achieving the clubs goals.

Develop a world-class soccer stadium and training ground, develop the academy, fitness center and medical facilities and maximize the commercial revenues with the development of facilities within and outside the stadium.

Handle all the busy day to day interactions with the manager, the board, finance, the players, staff, opposition managers and the demanding press.

No other game gives you total control of the club, but can you handle it?

CHOOSE FROM HUNDREDS OF CLUBS
Choose from 820 clubs in 38 leagues from 14 different countries across the world. Create your legacy and build your team from scratch including home country, club, stadium name, and kit design

UNRIVALED CLUB-LEVEL MANAGEMENT 
Manage every aspect of your club’s development and how you invest funds. Develop and upgrade your club's facilities, including the stadium, fitness center, medical, training ground and youth Academy. Increase revenues by negotiating sponsorships. Hire and fire your management team and build your dream squad by negotiating transfers and offers with player agents as well as handling contract negotiations with players and staff alike. 
 
EVERY DECISION COUNTS 
Just like real life, your decisions affect the attitude of the board, team morale, and even the fans. How you engage with press and media, ticket prices, the quality of your squad and the potential of your Academy prospects all have a bearing.
 
LIFELIKE STATS ENGINE
Club Soccer Director 2020’s comprehensive live-action stats engine mirrors real-life player behavior and match outcomes, processing over 1000 decisions per game and generates real-time statistics for both individual players and teams.
 
DEVELOP THE CLUB
Now is beautiful 3D you can create your own area for the club and develop your stadium, training ground, academy, facilities likes shops, fitness center, and medical facilities.

MATCH HIGHLIGHTS
For the first time Club Soccer Director 2020 shows key match highlights during the game so you can see those key goals and misses!

TACTICAL FREEDOM
Leave key decisions to the manager or overrule him by implementing your own play style a and deciding on team lineup, formation, in and out-of-possession tactics, substitutes and more.
 
COMPREHENSIVE PLAYER DATABASE
Buy or loan players from a database of over 30,000 players, each with their own unique play styles, stats and behaviours. Club Soccer Director 2020 continuously generates new players on a regular basis, ensuring you have plenty of talent to choose from whether you’ve been in the hot seat for 1 season or 10!   Player cycles continue beyond the pitch as some retiring players go into staff roles just as they do in real life!

FULL EDITOR
Full in-game editor allows you to edit team names, ground, kits, players avatars, staff avatars and share them with other players

DEVELOPED BY A REAL COACH AND MANAGER!
Lead developer Jim Scott is both a manager and coach, bringing over 15 years of industry experience to Club Soccer Director 2020.

comments: This game is frustrating and highly addictive in equal measures. Having started with League 2 Cambridge, I got them into a Champions League spot and won the Europa League in 12 seasons and am in the top 10 in the Premier League consistently. The frustrating bit: unless I've missed something, I have to pay cash for UEFA badges, to enable me to get a bigger job...or reach a reputation of Level 95 to get it free. Even by winning the Europa League and a League Cup with lowly Cambridge, I still only have a reputation of about 78! Paying you cash for progression and success (ironically for football) seems wrong.

The game is great, yes. But would be better with a few fixes. No way I'll working my ass off to get the funds needed for efficient running of the club, only for it to disappear be given peanuts at the start of each and every season. It's annoying, cause no way I'm spending on this game, I'd rather download a cracked version if this isn't checked in the next update/version, tick tock lol. Try making the game more realistic as we the gamers, expect.

Okay. The game has huge potential, it's really fun and I'm into it, but it has huge issues. The biggest issue is that it's pay to win. I played couple of seasons in different clubs and not once have I acomplished club goals!Not even to avoid regulation. The game is totally making you lose, no matter how hard you are investing and playing smart, you just lose unless you pay for boosts, which stops you from working in better clubs. When this issue is fixed, when game is balanced.

Here is suggestion from me for players that having a hard time playing this game. Try using a lower tier club, set the playing style to your favorite, sign a free player with higher rate than your squad and staff with the same playing style ASAP, get rid any player that doesn't suit your playstyle or you can sell them to free the wage budget and get cash, spend any available fund for upgrade stadium facility. I've been using Aldershot, playing 4 season until now and get promoted every year 😊

I like this game but it's needs serious attention and wisdom now I started season with Barcelona I won more than 40 La Liga league,Copa del Rey more than 20 times,More than 20 champions league and 1 Euro cup with Barcelona to be honest Premier league is more difficult league because any team can win league ,I spent 3 years in Premier ,I became Premier league runners up twice and I won Premier league once and league cup once,now I'm on year 2064,I have UEFA A certificate I haven't spent any money

title: Club Brugge
description:

title: Quran Club
description:
Join our global online community to help you read more Quran!

The Quran Club is a community of Muslims coming together to read and complete the Quran together. Our app is completely FREE and full of UNIQUE FEATURES you won't find on any other app.


NEW FEATURES:

- GLOBAL KHATAMS: Every verse you read on the Quran Club contributes towards a shared Quran Khatam, making your reading part of something bigger

- LIVE KHATAMS: Join a live khatam taking place right now!

- GROUPS: Set up a khatam amongst family and friends and track their reading through the app

- STATS: See how different countries and cities perform against one another 

- CHARITY: Dedicate your Quran as a prayer to a cause you believe in

- DONATE ADS: Donate money to charity for free by watching a short advert

- LEADERBOARDS: Compete anonymously against your friends, city and the globe to see who reads the most

- STREAKS: Read every day to build a streak and earn rewards

- BADGES: Earn badges for achieving specific milestones

- MY KHATAM: Complete the Quran at your own pace, choosing where to start 

- BROWSE: Read from any page, surah or juzu without affecting your bookmark



NEW QURAN FEATURES

- PINCH AND ZOOM: Choose the font size you wish the script to be

- DISPLAY MODES: 3 display modes for you to read Quran

- VERSE MODE: Read as little as 1 verse a day to make your Quran habit easy

- AUDIO TRANSLATION: Listen to the translation of each verse being played after each ayah

- 20 RECITERS: Choose one of 20 reciters to listen to 

- TRANSLITERATION: Learn to read the Quran with the script written in english

- 30 TRANSLATIONS: Follow the meaning of the Quran as you read

title: Punch Club - Fighting Tycoon
description:
★ "Punch Club is pretty awesome" -  9/10 TouchArcade
★ "Must be experienced by gamers far and wide" - 9/10 HardcoreGamer
★ "You're probably going to lose a good chunk of your life to it." - 9/10 PocketGamer

Your father was brutally murdered before your eyes. Now you must train hard, eat chicken and punch dudes in the face to earn your place in the Punch Club ranks, and discover who ended your father's life.

Punch Club is a boxing tycoon management game with multiple branching story lines. Your goal is clear, but how you get there depends on whether you want to legitimately climb the rankings, or take the more ridiculous, shady route.

Along the way you'll want to focus your talents. Will you take the Way of the Tiger, the Way of the Turtle, or the Way of the [other one?]? Your strength, accuracy and agility all depends on whichever Way enlightens your path. Do you have stripes, or flippers?

And every decision will matter, especially in your social life. You'll be juggling friendships, love life, work, recreational time, relationships, and possible stardom, all alongside your gym time and fighting aligators. It's not all just pumping iron, you know.

- Fighter management sim with RPG and tycoon elements
- Find out who killed your father, and maybe learn something about yourself along the way
- Heavily story-driven, with multiple different narrative branches and game endings to discover
- Get as deep with stats as you like, and find your own way through extensive skill trees
- Gorgeous pixel visuals with 80-90s references and nostalgia all over the place

I want to like it and have liked similar games but it's poorly designed on so many levels. I will be uninstalling it and avoiding this company.

title: Advantage Club
description:
Yes, because salary is definitely never enough!

Advantage Club extends "Corporate-Employee benefits" to Wellness, Dining, Education, Gyms, Entertainment and many more spheres of life. This app is the perfect Android companion to your Advantage Membership! Use the filter and location settings to pinpoint the savings most relevant to you.

Install the app to get easy access to all deals on the Advantage Club website, and with the v-card feature on the app, you need not even carry your card everywhere!

-- Features --
: Just flash the virtual card on your app before billing to avail your privileges
: Name-specific search: Tap on the search icon to quickly find just what you are looking for by name.
: Geo-specific search: Find out perks around your office, home or anywhere you are searching by location. If you do not choose a particular location, the app will auto suggest the deals in the order of location proximity to you.
: List View - Scroll through a list of nearby and online participating businesses with quick access to addresses and phone numbers.
---------------

Note: The Advantage Club mobile app requires that you sign in using a current Advantage Club (or Work Advantage) membership. You must have a registration voucher or passcode to register or must be approved through Advantage Club to register through your corporate email either on the website or this app itself. If you do not have a membership and wish for your company to provide you the same, email us at iwant@advantageclub.in .

Happy savings!

title: Dominoes Club
description:
FREE Domino Club app lets you play domino online on Android phones and tables with hundreds of real domino players using a central internet domino server at GameClubUSA.com. Play dominoes, chat, compete and improve your skills and rating!

Play Domino app offers 3 versions of online dominoes:
1. Five-up (also referred to as Muggins or All Fives)
2. Draw (or open variation)
3. Block (or closed variation)

Dominoes is a 2-player game of skill using 28 dominos where each player gets 7 or 9 dominos at start.
The goal in dominos is to be the first to get the agreed-upon number of points (100 - 500).

Five-Up Variation
In Five-Up, points are scored during the play
by making the exposed ends of the domino chain total to a multiple of five. 
The winner at the end of each hand also scores points for all the pips remaining in the other player's hand. Players can select 7-bone or 9-bone hand variations.
At the beginning of a dominoes game, the hands are dealt by random shuffling of tiles and distributing 7 or 9 tiles (also called bones or dominoes) to each player.
The remaining dominoes are placed in the boneyard to be drawn from by a player when a tile cannot be played from his hand. If this is the first hand of a game, the player with double six must play it first (also see options below - random 1st hand). If no one has the double six, the call goes out for double five, then double four, and so on until one of the players can produce the called for tile. Players then take turns. In subsequent hands, the winner of the previous hand starts the next game.
The first player to use all of own tiles wins the hand in a game. Once the winning piece is placed on the chain, the hand is over and the players expose their remaining pieces to be counted in the scoring. No further plays can be made by any of the players. It is possible for the game to reach a dead end, where all play is blocked and no tiles may be played. This outcome is called a blocked or jammed game.
If a player does not have any tiles which have a number of pips that matches one of the exposed ends of the chain, that player must draw from the boneyard one tile at a time until he/she draws one which may be played.

Draw Variation 
As opposed to Five-Up variation above, points are not awarded during play for making multiples of five. Points are awarded only at the end of each hand.
Each player tries to match the pips on one end of a tile from his/her hand with the pips on an open end of any tile in the chain. If a player is unable to match a tile from his/her hand with a tile in the chain, the player passes his/her turn. Each player may play only one tile per turn. If a player cannot match a tile with one in the chain, he/she must draw from the boneyard until the tile that can be played is drawn. If there are no tiles left in the boneyard, the player passes his/her turn. The first player to get rid of all dominoes wins the hand. If none of the players can make a play, the game ends in a block. If a hand ends in a block, the players turn the tiles in their hands face-up for counting. The player with the lowest total wins the hand and earns the points (1 point per pip) of all the tiles left remaining in his opponent's hand. The player who first reaches the agreed-upon number of points (100-500) or more is the overall winner.

Block Variation
This is similar to Draw variation above, except no player can draw from a boneyard. If none of the players can make a play, the hand ends in a block. The players turn the tiles in their hands face-up for counting. The player with the lowest total wins the hand and earns the points (1 point per pip) of all the tiles left remaining in his opponent's hand. The player who first reaches the final number of points (100-500) or more is the overall winner.
As this is an internet domino game, Internet connection is required. WIFI connection is not necessary - will play well with 3G connection. Domino Club automatically reconnects if connection is lost.

title: Archery World Club 3D
description:
Nothing clears a trouble mind better than shooting a bow!  Join Archery World Club and start your practice today! Aim, focus and shoot! 
HYPERREALISTIC ARCHERY SIMULATION
Archery World Club completely simulates this ancient to modern sports from every aspect: 3D graphic, wind effects, draw strength, arrow and the target. It is a great chance to experience the gigantic tension before shooting an arrow and the total relaxation seconds later. Also, you can improve your skills by practicing daily, and upgrade your equipment to become a master! 
EASY TO PLAY
Press on the screen to draw the bow, and try to aim at your target. Release your finger and the shoot the arrow! It is a game that can improve your focus ability!
ADDICTIVE GAME MODES
In our Archery World Club, you do not only shoot for high score. Two different game modes make this game very entertaining. In Training Mode, you will practice your skills under different circumstances (Distance, moving/still target, wind power..etc) Try to reach the high score in this mode, hit on the bull’s eye for the highest achievement! In Mission Mode, archers need to complete interesting goals to earn rewards, such as making the final score to 39, or hitting at the 1 point zone. Will you become the archery champion?
BUILD YOUR BOW COLLECTION
Complete different challenges to collect coins. Use your savings to purchase new equipment. A good bow is more steady for holding, and it also allows you to put more weight on when drawing. A nice arrow will fly better under windy conditions. 
ARCHERY WORLD CLUB FEATURES:
100% Simulation of modern archery 
Realistic 3D graphics 
Different game modes and levels of addictive archery challenges 
Totally free for download
More exciting game modes(Online tournament) and updates will be released in future!

Download it now and discover your potential in Archery World Club!
Please like our facebook page to receive more information about this game：
www.facebook.com/tinywings
Or contact us via email: dream.game.inc@hotmail.com

Press on the screen to draw the bow, and try to aim at your target. Release your finger and the shoot the arrow! It is a game that can improve your focus ability!
ADDICTIVE GAME MODES
In our Archery World Club, you do not only shoot for high score. Two different game modes make this game very entertaining. In Training Mode, you will practice your skills under different circumstances (Distance, moving/still target, wind power..etc) Try to reach the high score in this mode, hit on the bull’s eye for the highest achievement! In Mission Mode, archers need to complete interesting goals to earn rewards, such as making the final score to 39, or hitting at the 1 point zone. Will you become the archery champion?
BUILD YOUR BOW COLLECTION
Complete different challenges to collect coins. Use your savings to purchase new equipment. A good bow is more steady for holding, and it also allows you to put more weight on when drawing. A nice arrow will fly better under windy conditions.

100% Simulation of modern archery

title: Club Soccer Director - Soccer Club Manager Sim
description:
Be more than just a soccer manager in Club Soccer Director 2018. Take on the role of Director and manage the day-to-day running of an established club or even create your own. Keep the Board happy by driving up revenues, hiring and firing staff, upgrading your stadium and facilities, signing sponsors, building your dream team and leading your club to ultimate glory!
 
CHOOSE FROM HUNDREDS OF CLUBS
Choose from 350 clubs in 16 leagues across England, France, Germany, Spain and Italy. Create your legacy and build your team from scratch including home country, club and stadium name and even kit design. 
 
UNRIVALLED CLUB-LEVEL MANAGEMENT 
Manage every aspect of your club’s development and how you invest funds. Develop and upgrade your club's facilities, including the stadium, training ground and youth Academy. Increase revenues by negotiating sponsorships. Hire and fire your management team and build your dream squad by negotiating transfers and offers with player agents as well as handling contract negotiations with players and staff alike. 
 
EVERY DECISION COUNTS 
Just like real life, your decisions affect the attitude of the board, team morale and even the fans. How you engage with press and media, ticket prices, the quality of your squad and the potential of your Academy prospects all have a bearing.
 
LIFELIKE STATS ENGINE
Club Soccer Director 2018’s comprehensive live-action stats engine mirrors real-life player behaviour and match outcomes, processing over 1000 decisions per game and generates real-time statistics for both individual players and teams. 

TACTICAL FREEDOM
Leave key decisions to the manager or overrule him by implementing your own play style as well as deciding on team lineup, formation, in and out-of-possession tactics, substitutes and more.
 
COMPREHENSIVE PLAYER DATABASE
Buy or loan players from a database of over 10,000 players, each with their own unique play styles, stats and behaviours. Use filters to find exactly what you’re looking for. Club Soccer Director 2018 continuously generates new players on a regular basis, ensuring you have plenty of talent to choose from whether you’ve been in the hot-seat for 1 season or 10!   Player cycles continue beyond the pitch as some retiring players go into staff roles just as they do in real life!

DEVELOPED BY A REAL SOCCER COACH AND MANAGER!
Lead developer Jim Scott is both a soccer manager and coach, bringing over 15 years of industry experience to Club Soccer Director 2018.

comments: Four star rating from me not because I'm not enjoying the since I love the game.The boring thing is despite me being profitable in a team the board still reduces the wage budgets every season even after I use my hard earned coins to invest in the club which brings me back to square one with a wage budget deficit of about 1mil bucks.Another negative aspect of the game is when the board reduces the available funds with 28mil to increase the available funds with a mere 50k.Is that even realistic?

Very bad game. I am not happy with the fact that you have to spend real money to upgrade your coaching badge. I played 25 matches and won just 2, no money to buy professional players. Very bad game by all standard.

After playing 14 seasons on this came it soon became evident that you would love it at the beginning but it will become virtually impossible to manage clubs as the wages of players become so unbelievably high that it makes it so difficult practically impossible to be able to build a squad with any depth at all if the game was to bring in unbelievably high budgets then it will be okay but the budgets stay normal and the board never seem to invest funds overall a good game but needs improvements

title: Rotary Club Locator
description:
Find a club meeting wherever you are with the Rotary Club Locator app. Search by city, state, country and meeting day or by distance from your location. 

The Rotary Club Locator app gives you: 
•	A list of clubs in the area 
•	Club meeting location, day, and time 
•	Map of the selected Club 
•	Driving Directions to the club. 
•	Club president and secretary contact details and ability to add on address book
•	Ability to sync Club Meeting Schedule on phone calendar 
•	Donate via SMS to POLIO fund
•	Save your favorite clubs
•	Save app settings

You’ll also find information about Rotary and how to become a member on the Rotary Club Locator app. 
The Rotary Club Locator app can locate only those clubs that have submitted the street address of their meeting place to Rotary International via Member Access. 

SUPPORTED ANDROID VERSIONS –Android 2.2 and above
NOTE: Before you launch the application please make sure you follow steps below:
1.	Go to "Settings" application on your phone and select "Location and Security" option.
2.	Please make sure one of the following option is enabled:
a.	"Use wireless networks"
b.	"Use GPS satellites"

------------------------------------------------------------
Please uninstall/delete previous version of application and then install the new version.

title: Social Club (Unofficial)
description:
This app is made by user TheRealAntares on Playstation 4.
It's a fan-made app that 'simply' views the Rockstar Social Club website.

GTA 5 was released in 2013. As of 2019, I am still surprised that there is no Social Club app.
My friends use this app to download 'jobs' and 'playlists' directly to your accounts.

The app supports 'push notifications'.

Depending on the amount of downloads and comments, I'm planning to use the push notifications for releasing information on special events, such as double RP & Money.

Copyright Policy:
If you think this app might violate copyrights, please contact me and I will remove this app from the PlayStore.

The source code of this app can be seen here: https://github.com/nayiem-personal/rockstar-social-club

Permissions:
Internet: Access Internet.
Internet Network State: Check if you have internet.
Read and Write Storage: To save your account settings within the app.

title: Clubforce - Managing Member Data
description:
Club communications are simple with Clubforce. Club volunteers issue notifications via app, SMS or email and members.

Members can communicate directly with the club via Groups, have full control of their communication preferences and have full access to their Clubforce member account to make membership payments, purchase tickets, support fundraisers and review their account history. 

Coaches can see in real-time who has replied to notifications, who will or will not attend training, who has paid their fees for the current season. This allows coaches to focus on what they do best – coaching players! 

Club Administrators can create open and closed communication groups for a variety of volunteers needs and retain complete control of group creation, group administration permissions and group participation. 

Everyone has the peace of mind of knowing club membership and fundraising payments and personal data are fully secure. 

Clubforce makes managing member data a more efficient experience for various volunteer roles across different types of clubs and societies. Through the Administration Panel, volunteers manage all club fundraising, communications and member registrations online, with progress monitored through easy-to-use reporting dashboards. 

With a focus on reducing paperwork and administration and saving time for club volunteers, Clubforce ensures club and member data is always secure with NGB software integrations designed to reduce data duplication, clerical errors and security risks. This innovative, market-leading application is available on desktop and mobile and is backed by unrivalled support and a friendly, helpful service. 

Clubforce together with the CF shield symbol are a registered trade mark of Net Beo Teoranta (trading as Clubforce).

title: Quik Club
description:
Become a Quik Club member and easily earn rewards on qualifying purchases at Quik Mart Convenience Stores using the Quik Club App!

HOW IT WORKS
- Download the Quik Club App
- Scroll through the app to see available offers and rewards
- Scan your barcode or enter your Alt ID at every checkout to earn rewards
- Enter your ALT ID at the pump before you pay to save on every fill-up

FEATURES

FIND DEALS. Scroll through the app to view all available cents-per-gallon offers. Plus, Quik Club members save 5¢/gal for every $25 spent in-store*.

TRACK PROGRESS. Know when you’re about to earn your next reward or free item.

QUIK CHECKOUT. Easily access your member barcode and Alt ID at checkout so you never miss out on earning or saving.

STATION LOCATOR. Find the fastest route to your nearest Quik Mart location.

Don’t miss out! Save money with this free and convenient app that rewards you for buying food, drinks, and filling up at your local Quik Mart convenience stores.

*Basket offer excludes alcohol and tobacco items.

title: Fight Club 5th Edition
description:
Leave your books, character sheets, and dice bags at home. Fight Club 5th Edition serves as a digital character sheet that can be all you need to play a Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition game.

Character SheetEverything you would write into a 5th Edition character sheet can be inputted into Fight Club. Set your basic character information (ability scores, skills, proficiencies, etc...) and all the stats will be automatically calculated. Any bonuses/penalties you receive through various traits and features can be also be set. And, if going completely paperless isn't allowed in your game, the app can also generate a printable character sheet PDF file.

SpellbookSelect from a large list of fully detailed spells and add them to your PC's spellbook. Select which are prepared for the day. Track spell slot usage. Everything you'll need for your sorcerers and wizards.

EquipmentKeep a list of all of your equipment and loot. All of your armor and weapons can be equipped and unequipped and with the tap of a button and stats, like armor class, will automatically change to reflect your current gear.

Dice RollerAll of your stats and attacks can be rolled with a tap of a button. Also included is dice calculator that allows you to input a custom roll. Need to roll 1d20 + 6d9 + Constitution modifier? Fight Club has what you need.

CompendiumA customizable compendium of content that by default includes all of the races, classes, backgrounds, feats, equipment, spells, and the monsters from the System Reference Document 5.1. This does not contain all of the official content from the Player's Handbook so you'll have to input any missing. To make adding easier, there is an Import feature through which you can type/copy content on your PC then transfer the file into the compendium. Fan made files are also available for download, so search online.

Premium VersionThe app is free to download, but you are limited creating only one character and you will see a small advertisement at the bottom of the screen. Upgrading to the premium version with the in-app purchase will allow you to create unlimited characters and remove any advertisements.

Leave your books, character sheets, and dice bags at home. Fight Club 5th Edition serves as a digital character sheet that can be all you need to play a Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition game.

Character Sheet

Equipment

I learned this the hard way after deleting a class that took my 1 week to do. Add that, and this'll be perfect

its an amazing supplement to the book, but the app is lacking in a lot of class traits and stuff. for instance, it only has the invocation path for wizards. otherwise, its really good for tracking stats and inventory and limited use abilities and has a dice roller built in
Untill recent, it's been great. But thanks to the new update, I can't create a character because it won't let me roll gold or choose equipment. Please fix soon

Nice app. it is quite similar to Squire. The initial character setup is quite OK, once you get the hang of it. I really like the fact that it works in landscape on my tablet. My wish list (in order priority) * please add descriptions to the conditions! * when you throw a weapon, it should not be in your inventory anymore. * it would be nice to have to choose a slot when I roll for a spell. Now I have to manually expand a slot in a different location on the page, and I sometimes forget this. * some conditions could be triggered automatically (e.g., prone in case of unconsious).

One of the best character sheets on the market. It does a great job of integrating numbers from different sets. (bg, class, race profs and stats) I find the inventory to be a little clunky (moving item from disguise Kit to backpack; why not just put thing in the backpack that you eqiup? Difficult to navigate until you get used to it. Still a really fresh app for keeping characters digitally. I use it a lot. This and squire pro are the best IMO.

title: Landrys Select Club
description:
We’re making it even easier for you to stay connected on the go. Download the Landry’s, Inc. app to manage your Landry’s Select Club account, find Landry’s locations near you, make reservations, view menus, purchase gift cards and more.

Features:
-	Find restaurants nearby or search based upon city, state and zip code
-	View menus, make reservations and get directions
-	Select your favorite locations for easy reference
-	Register your Landry’s Select Club account
-	Manage your account profile and view recent transactions
-	Elect to defer/enable your rewards when dining
-	Receive messages and updates from Landry’s Select Club

Landry’s, Inc. has over 500 properties nationwide, featuring the best in dining, hospitality

recentChanges: Added new features like Refer A Friend, Multiple gift card purchases in single cart, and support for multiple brands. We’re always making changes and improvements to the Landry’s Select Club app.  Please update the app for a better user experience.
comments: Hello, I am new to Landry's select club and upon registration of my card through the app I noticed that my address/telephone number is displayed on the homepage. In your next update please consider moving such identifiable information from the homepage to the account information page or somewhere else not as easily viewable. Protecting my home location is important to me and moving such easily read information would be great. Thank you for your prompt attention in finding a correction.

App is easy to use and allows you to turn on 'Defer points' and save your rewards up for use later on and all at once right from your phone turn off "Defer" when your ready to enjoy your reward points.
The Landry's Select Club program is awesome, but the app could be better. The navigation is a little clunky and there's not many features in it.
Very helpful in keeping tabs on points. Easy to navigate

Had to call the Club to get it working. Now, in the house, trying to found the closiest restaurant, it takes forever! Using my location along with my zip code! Not sure if it'll even work outside , away from my Internet equipment. Not happy at all.

title: Kennedy Clubs
description: Welcome to the Kennedy Club Fitness App. Sign up for classes, courts, swim lanes or conveniently pay your account balances, check your visit history and more, for any of the four Kennedy Club Fitness locations: Paso Robles, Atascadero, San Luis Obispo and Arroyo Grande. Your KCF membership includes full use of all four locations, five pools, over 300 group exercise classes each week including Cycling, Yoga, Barre, Aqua, Strength-Training, Cardio, Pilates and more. State-of-the-art cardio and strength/functional training areas, basketball, racquetball, squash, handball and volleyball are also available. Enjoy the K-Zone Recovery/Relaxation Centers offering Decompression Massage Chairs, HydroMassage, Infrared Cocoons and Red-Fit Room. All instructors and personal trainers are certified to help you reach your health and fitness goals safely and successfully. Youth programs are offered year-round and Kidz Club is a popular spot for children between the ages of 6 weeks and 10 years old. At Kennedy Club Fitness, there truly is ‘something’ for ‘every body’. Never a risk of FOMO (fear of losing out) here. Not a member? Click here for a free trial today. Link to: http://kennedyclubs.weebly.com/

title: activity club
description:
Activity Club version 2.0 "we put clubs in your club" edition  

Compete with your friends! Activity.Club is a health and fitness app that makes it easy to compete against your friends and motivate each other to stay fit.  Whether you have a Fitbit, Jawbone, or Google Fit, or Samsung S Health, Activity Club has you covered.  

What can Activity.Club do?

- Allows you to compete against your friends using the Activity.Club points system.  The points system is based on physical effort so people of varying levels of health can all work together to stay motivated, no matter what sports they do.

- Start a fitness and motivation club with your friends or team.  Keep in touch and chat about your activities and stay motivated with your co-workers, sports team, or any group of your choice.

- Receive awards when you reach different goals and milestones, as well as spontaneous awards, which may happen at any moment!

- Get notifications when one of your friend passes you on the daily leaderboard, and get notifications when you pass them.

- Send Hi-Five’s to your friends to keep them motivated, to signify encouragement or awesomeness.

- Set a daily goal for Activity Points and see how far along each day you are to completing your goal.

- Provides a centralized place to view you and your friends fitness activities and see how you stack up.

What hardware and software is supported?

- Activity.Club embraces the wonders of modern technology and supports gathering health data from:
    - Google Fit, which support most built-in step trackers on Android phones
    - Samsung S-Health version 4.0 or greater, which supports built-in step trackers for Samsung handsets
    - Fitbit trackers
    - Jawbone trackers
    - Strava
    - Runkeeper
    - Withings
    - Underarmour
    - Misfit
    - Microsoft Health Band
    - more being added with each release


We hope you love it as much as we do!

Download today, For Your Health!

Please contact for.your.health@activity.club for questions or support.

comments: Ok you know I love this app.. when I had a Fitbit and an apple watch is was great. I recently switched to a Samsung tracker and none of my stats are symmetrical. Slightly disappointed but hey I know androids format is much more complicated. I remember when I had a Garmin it was a nightmare to integrate my workout data. Anyhow plz fix this
Install. Signup with fb. Does not work? Uninstall, 1 star
Can't sync to Google fit or garmin
Just was not impressed.
Ok thanks for

title: EAT Club
description:
Is it lunchtime yet? We know that’s what’s on your mind, and the all-new EAT Club for Android app has the answer you’re looking for. First, browse what’s for lunch today and pick your favorite. Then, twiddle your thumbs, or finish that spreadsheet you’ve been hacking away at. Finally, it’s lunchtime! The app will notify you when lunch has arrived.

Features:
- Browse EAT Club’s daily selections, dish descriptions, ratings and reviews
- Easily order lunch whether you’re on the go, stuck in a meeting, or rushing because you overslept your alarm
- Be an overachiever and order all of your lunches for the week, right from the app
- Get pinged when your lunch has been delivered, beat coworkers to the lunch table

Important:
While this app has lifelong aspirations of allowing in-app registrations (and becoming a doctor), at the moment you’ll need to have an existing EAT Club account to be able to order. Visit www.myeatclub.com for more info.

This app should look like an Android app butbit looks like an IOS app. Please dont copy designs from IOS.. That slide down arrow on actionbar is pretty confusing for Android users...More material design please....

installed app, when opened it says welcome back, and i never was on it ever. wont let me register or log in . this is wack

title: My Club Med
description:
Soon in Resort with your tribe?

 

My Club Med is the ideal travel partner who will help you prepare and organize your stay, so that you and your tribe have an unforgettable vacation.

 

 

Before your stay

 

• From the "Information" section, discover your Resort, and prepare your suitcase according to the dress code.

• Start to prepare your arrival: consult the activities planning, discover the infrastructures, the Resort map.

 

A taste of happiness.

 

During your stay

 

• Discover all the activities and find the ones that best suit your desires to make up your day.

• Make the most of your vacation. Find a sport buddy*, book a moment at the spa *, order your Room Service * ... and other exclusive services allowing you to fully enjoy your experience in our Resorts.

• For our Mountain Resorts*, find dedicated functions: Ski map, weather forecast, live webcam.

 

And don't forget to log in to enjoy 100% of My Club Med services.

 

See you soon in our Resorts.

 

* available in a selection of Resorts

recentChanges:
Download the latest version of My Club Med to discover new features and optimizations:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- New design of the screen “Schedule & Activities”
comments: Just started using it. It's definitely a big step from last trip (Bali 07/19). Yet to try on location (1 week to go). I wonder if this app is next gen and poor ratings are due to last gen devices. Impressed so far. At least this time I'll have an idea of what to pack so I can match dress code. 😄
I am so annoyed by the login process. Provide clearer guidance on login credentials required. Stop clearing the screen when I change apps to find my gm number.
Worst app ever! Doesn't open, but when it does, it always asks for your 12 digit booking number. Forget it.
Since the latest update, I have to re-login every time I open the app. Very frustrating.
Does not list times for live music in activities.

title: Pampers Club: Gifts for Babies & Parents
description:
Join millions of experienced & new parents and turn your Pampers baby products into useful and fun reward points. Download the Pampers Club app and scan the codes on the inside of your diaper packs to get reward points. Plus, win guaranteed Instant Shopping Rewards for every 3 scans! Redeem your points for hundreds of rewards like baby gear, baby gifts, coupons for diapers, diaper deals, home products, gift cards, electronics, and more!

Get rewards for the cash you spend on Pampers diapers, wipes and baby essentials! Collect reward points with every baby care product purchase and get pampered! There are tons of exciting shopping rewards waiting for you:

- Health and beauty gifts for mom & dad
- Baby toys and other baby items for fun times with your little one
- Home and living products
- Donations to various children’s charities that make an impact
- Big sweepstakes, amazing gift cards and free baby diapers
- Browse the gift catalog to find baby gifts, gifts for moms and dads and gifts for the family!
- Rewards coupons to turn your baby diapers and baby essentials into savings


Getting started:

• Download the Pampers Club app and create your Rewards Program account. Already registered with Pampers Rewards Program? Great! Then all you’ll need to do is sign in. Racking up reward points is quick and easy!
• Every time you buy Pampers diapers or baby wipes, add the product code with the app and get reward points and club deals.
• Redeem points and choose rewards! Discover a wide selection of shopping rewards including electronics, gift cards, baby gear, diaper coupons, club discounts on baby products, home and living items, and much more!

Terms and conditions: https://www.pampers.com/en-us/rewards-terms-conditions
Website: https://www.pampers.com/en-us/rewards

developer: Pampers by P&G - Diapers, Baby products & Rewards
recentChanges: - We’ve gotten extra creative with some new designs and images for you.
comments: I have tried everything to access my account. I have re-installed the app, changed passwords. I kept getting an "app failed" response when trying to login. Re-installed multiple times. Tried changing my password using my laptop bc nothing worked on the app. Still can't sign in on the app using new password. Can't start a new account with my email address. It's just a dead end trying to use this app. I want access to my Pampers reward points and I can't use them if the app is not functional.

The app won't send a message to verify my phone. Never set it up under a different phone number so it shouldn't be a problem. Uninstalled it and restated phone, still won't send the message. Can't use an app that won't do what it says it will do. This is the worst app I've ever tried to install.

In the beginning I love the app but then when I got a new phone and new number I was unable to log into the app from you the new phone it kept sending the code to the old number and it would ask is this the right number but don't give you the option to say no or it give you the option for the code to be sent to an email so I haven't been able to use the app in about a month.

Changed phones and now the camera has successfully read a barcode one time, not a huge deal but I wish it was a little better, like actually works. I use the same phone for a few other apps that use the camera with zero issue. The notifications are useless. Now I know people are like "well Dan, just turn off your notifications" I would except I have them to catch deals and I get notifications that contradict each other on a regular basis!

Easy to use. Great design. And I absolutely LOVE the notifications of positive love and support for parents. On weeks I have a baby screaming because he is growing, or missing his dad, or teething, they give me joy and remind me that I am doing the best I can do and that is what counts. I just wish they sent out more of them.

title: Club Pilates
description:
The Club Pilates member app has everything you need to maximize your Club Pilates studio practice! View and book classes, crush your fitness goals, and manage your waitlisted classes. You can even link your fitness device to track your workouts! Contact your local Club Pilates studio to get started on your in-studio Pilates workouts!

Have a comment or question? Email our team directly at clubpilatesapp@netpulse.com.
descriptionHTML:
The Club Pilates member app has everything you need to maximize your Club Pilates studio practice! View and book classes, crush your fitness goals, and manage your waitlisted classes. You can even link your fitness device to track your workouts! Contact your local Club Pilates studio to get started on your in-studio Pilates workouts!

Have a comment or question? Email our team directly at clubpilatesapp@netpulse.com.
summary: Track your workout in the club and on the go with the Club Pilates app.
developerAddress:
3815 Pullman Street
Costa Mesa, CA 92626
recentChanges: Hey sporty, thanks for using Club Pilates app. This release is about making your app experience more stable, so we’ve made a few under the hood improvements, minor UI updates and bug fixes.  Enjoy!
comments: Great! Makes it easy to schedule and plan up to 15 visits ahead. I have it 4 stars because I wish the waitlist would not take up one of those 15 slots. I also think it would be great if the class you registered for would get highlighted under the FIND A CLASS section because going back and forth between MY SCHEDULE and FIND A CLASS is annoying. Overall these are smsll things. The app is easy to figure out and works well.

Well organized. Choosing classes: easy to request list by instructor or level/type of class. Can see my own bookings on one page. Will add my classes to my Google calendar if I ask. Know when I have selected all the classes my membership allows in that time frame (very helpful if membership is a certain number per pay period).

Easy to book classes and view schedule on one page. Visibility into waitlist position is great, but it needs to send a push notification to text if you get booked in last minute. Does not track classes automatically, which would make it a 5 star app.
Excellent app. Simple to use with many features, e.g., signing up for classes, seeing your schedule, recording & analyzing your workouts, and more.
This is a nice app that does exactly what you need. Check schedule, available credits, and book or cancel classes from your phone, smoothly and efficiently.

title: Period Tracker Clue - Ovulation and Cycle Calendar
description:
Clue is more than a period tracker – it’s an accurate menstrual calendar, ovulation app and fertility tracker that helps you make sense of your menstrual cycle. Get predictions and set calendar reminders for your period, track and find patterns in your symptoms, and manage your menstrual health with an app that isn’t pink or full of ads.

This is the Clue approach to period tracking: grounded in science, empowering, and definitely not pink. 

Clue Period and Ovulation Tracker Top Features:
· Free period tracker, ovulation tracker, and fertility tracker
· Period predictions for your next three cycles
· Log your symptoms, flow, moods and more
· Ovulation app to track ovulation tests and your BBT 
· Calendar reminders for upcoming periods, ovulation and PMS
· Forecasts for your recurring symptoms, like upcoming cramps, pain, and headaches
· A period calendar with your menstruation, ovulation and fertile days
· Log and set birth control pill reminders
· A cycle analysis of your period lengths to observe trends and irregularities
· Menstrual health tips curated for you that explain your symptoms 

Period Tracker & Menstrual Calendar 
· Period, fertile day and ovulation predictions always let you know what’s coming
· A period diary to log your period days, flow intensity and the menstrual products you use
· Set up calendar reminders before your next period, ovulation, fertile window and PMS 

Ovulation Tracker & Fertility Tracker: 
· **Best Fertility App of 2019** according to Healthline
· Ovulation calculator and basal body temperature tracker
· Fertility predictions and fertility friend to help you get pregnant if you’re trying to conceive
· Log ovulation test and cervical fluid for improved ovulation estimations
· Set fertility and ovulation calendar reminders to help plan a pregnancy

Cycle Analysis, Menstrual Health Tips & Forecasts for your Symptoms:
· An analysis tab to keep track of your period lengths and cycle variations
· See the symptoms you tracked in relation to your menstrual cycle
· Find recurrent patterns in your symptoms and get forecasts for cramps, pain & more
· Bring the Clue Period Tracker app to your healthcare provider and have your period history available.

A progressive period app built for everyone with a menstrual cycle:
· Inclusive, gender-neutral language and values that benefit a diverse community
· Built by a mission-driven, female-led team 
· The free period app with an award-winning, clean design
· Helpful for people managing their PCOS or irregular cycles
· Just started menstruating? The Clue Cycle Tracker is a useful free period tracker for teens 

Helloclue.com –  a reliable resource and menstrual encyclopedia with answers to all of your period and sex questions.

Hormonal – Clue’s popular podcast that dives deep into hormones and the menstrual cycle.

twitter.com/clue
facebook.com/helloclue
instagram.com/clueapp

If you run into any trouble, the support team is here to help! Please reach us through the app so we can assist you more effectively. 

Tap:
1. "More" menu 
2. Support
3. Choose the topic of your inquiry
Or, submit a request directly through this form: support.helloclue.com

Note: Clue Period Tracker & Ovulation app should not be used as a contraceptive.

Clue Period Tracker & Ovulation app – the menstrual cycle tracker and period app that’s different! Simplify your period tracking and menstrual health once and for all—join over 15 million people who are using Clue as a trusted period and ovulation tracker, period calendar, birth control pill reminder and ovulation app.

developerAddress: Adalbertstraße 8, 10999 Berlin
recentChanges: Thanks for using Clue! We are always working behind the scenes to build the best menstrual cycle tracker app out there. This update improves your predictions and enhances your experience. If you’re enjoying the app, feel free to leave us a rating and review!
comments: I love this app and have been using it for YEARS. I have a very irregular cycle and this app makes tracking it (and all the symptoms that go with it) a piece of cake. Thanks for helping my doctor visits be more productive, and for helping me to find patterns in my skin clarity and mood swings! Also I love that the Pro version isn't crazy expensive. I barely even feel the $1/month and the benefits are well worth the cost!

Used this app for YEARS and has never failed me except for lately. There's no option for my method of birth control (arm implant) and it has thrown off my cycle predictions and analysis. Also, in the last few updates, I've been unable to add my own tags. Please fix this, I love this app and the work put into it so much I don't want to switch to another.

Clue's timing is very on point for me. I do wish it offered more customization outside of adding tags. Examples: 1- I had my tubes removed, so I ovulate, but am not exactly fertile. It'd be nice to be able to turn off the "fertile window" when all I want is an approximate ovulation date. 2- I do yoga and bike, but I don't run or swim; wish I could replace those buttons with exercise I *do* engage in.

I've been using this app for about 5 years to keep track of my period, as well as when PMS is gonna hit. I've even used it to track if I've taken my birth control. This app also provides educational information about not just periods, but menstrual cycles overall so it's perfect for anyone who may not know a lot about their cycle. It's also very inclusive of trans & nonbinary people as well. I 100% reccomend this app to anyone who menstruates. Keep up the good work guys!❤

After using a website tracker for 12 years I finally switched over to an app. After extensive research I settled on Clue for ease of use, readability, and complete coverage of symptoms. I loaded about a year's worth of back data and received decently accurate predictions. I am very happy with my choice and will support the developers as soon as I am able.

title: Gun Club Armory
description:
Lock and load with Gun Club Armory: the finest weapon simulation experience for mobile devices. An arsenal of stunningly detailed and interactive 3D weapons are yours to modify, load, and fire in this pure weapon sim.

REAL-WORLD SIMULATION

Each weapon is a faithful recreation of its real world counterpart, and all weapons are completely interactive. You can load magazines, fold stocks, adjust the fire select, cock the hammer, discharge and more - every weapon is unique.

CUSTOMISE

Each weapon also comes with a range of accessories included. Stocks, bipods, scopes, laser sights, grenade launchers, extended mags, and a variety of camo options. And if you want to test the accuracy of your weapon, you can take it to the live-fire target range and try it out on a range of different target types.

BUILD YOUR STOCKPILE

The app comes with a host of weapons to choose from, including nine free weapons to get you started,

STARTER WEAPONS
G18 Pistol
Eagle AE Pistol
MP5-A3 
M-80 Shotgun
Striker Shotgun
G36-K
AK-47
Vintorez
AWSM Sniper Rifle

Additional packs will be added on a regular basis. To start things off, we have two WWII packs and this release introduces the new Russian Spetsnaz pack

ALLIED WEAPONS
M1911
PPSh-41
M1 Garand
M1918-A2
M1897 Trench Gun
Sten Mk IIS
M1928-A1

AXIS WEAPONS
Luger 9mm
P-38 
MP-40
STG-44
FG-42
Kar-98K
MG-42

SPETSNAZ WEAPONS
MP-445
PP-2000
SR-2M Veresk
PP-19 Bizon
Saiga-12
AN-94
SVU-AS


Many more packs to come! Join us at facebook.com/gunclubarmory for updates on future releases!

comments: It's ok I guess, but unless you want to pay $1 for every other gun you dont get for free(and there are very little guns you get for free considering all the others) you get bored too fast because you run out of things to do so you either just keep repeating the same things on the same gun, or you end up like me, just deleting it all together. Creators of the game, if you are going to charge $1 for every other gun you need to give people more guns for free and more things to do with the guns.

Brilliant simulator! Lots of fun! I would like to add that it would be nice if each individual weapon had separate loadouts and setups. Like with different camos and attachments to give the player more options for customization. Great game nonetheless!

Models are good, same goes with the ammunition boxes. The reason I give this a 3 star is because the reflective lighting cannot be fixed so you're gun is just dead. Another reason is because on a shotgun, you have to put in the shells, and that makes my camera view yank to the bottom of the gun. Overall, the game is pretty good. I would recommend it for people who like reflective lighting. That's the end of this report.

This game is amazing but there is one problem you can only use the guns that are given to you or you can get for free like the fg 42 it would be great if you can do achievements to get the currency for the guns that need real money to get and it would also be great if we could move freely instead of the isolated range or survival like the zombie event on the range but with waves and wave of zombies while trying to keep your health bar the highest it can be
This still remains to be the best of all versions. Also, I liked that I can restore my purchased items. Awesome. Very fun gameplay, great job!

title: Country Club World
description:
The Country Club now fits right into your pocket! Enjoy an all-new mobile app especially tailored to Android users.

The Country Club mobile Application includes the following features:

The Country Club mobile application allows users to browse and locate updated Country Club properties (Resorts, Hotels, Clubs and Fitness centers) all across the globe. Users have convenient buttons to call, email or look up properties on a map. Users can also view available resort photos as well. 
Country Club / Country Vacations members can login with their Country Club account credentials or with facebook or google if the email that we have matches the same facebook/google email. Members can instantly  view profiles, pay your membership/annual maintenance fee and book holidays real-time with instant confirmation voucher.
 
Drop in your queries or grievances to the Customer Care team and get a reply back instantly.
MEMBERS GET INR 50 or AED 5 auto AMC credit for the first time you download this app and log in with your membership credentials.

Country Club Hospitality and Holidays is an Indian based company operating primarily in Middle east and India with some presence in Europe and Asia. We own/operate a total of over 70 properties divided into Clubs, hotels, resorts and fitness centers. We sell a unique family membership which gives access to 4 verticals including Club membership, Holiday membership, Fitness membership and events. We have an IOS and Android app which serves our 4,00,000 members around the globe are are listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange.

title: Lifetime Movie Club
description:
If you love Lifetime movies, then you need Lifetime Movie Club! With a great selection of new and classic movies available at any time, and fresh ones rotated in and out every week, there will always be something new and juicy to choose from. Indulge in your favorite Lifetime movies of all genres, including suspense, drama, true stories, teen movies, and of course, romance. Stream classics like Fifteen and Pregnant, thrillers like The Perfect Stalker, or true stories like Jodi Arias: Dirty Little Secret. We also offer weekly, curated playlists featuring your favorite Hollywood stars.

The best part? It’s only $3.99 per month or $39.99 a year after your FREE 7-day trial for all these great features:
- New movies added weekly
- No commercials
- Curated playlists 
- Continue watching where you left of on your favorite device
- Easy billing through Google Play 
- Automatic monthly or annual renewal 
- Cancel anytime in your Google Play Account Settings
- No TV provider needed
- 7-DAY FREE TRIAL

Note: Free Trial is only valid for first-time subscribers. Movies can only be streamed in the U.S. and U.S. Territories.

Payment is charged to the Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by visiting Account Settings on your device. If you turn off auto-renew during the current subscription period, your subscription will be canceled for the subsequent period. 

Please contact lmc_support@aenetworks.com if you are experiencing any issues.

title: Trunk Club
description:
Personal styling is the new way to shop, and we make it effortless and fun. We pair you with a stylist—a real person you can talk with online or in person—to find you the clothes that make you feel great. As a Nordstrom company, we have access to all the best brands and an iconic standard of care. Your stylist will send you Trunks full of outfits styled just for you, so you can try everything on at home. Keep what you love and send back what you don’t.

Trunk Club features:

● Real stylists
● The best selection of brands, backed by Nordstrom
● No subscription required—pay only for what you keep
● Free shipping and returns

App features:

● Chat with your personal stylist one-­on-­one
● Browse outfit ideas and get suggestions and advice from your stylist
● Preview and approve the clothes in your Trunks before they ship
● Track your Trunk, leave feedback, and pay for the items you keep

Chicago, IL 60654
recentChanges:
We've made some updates:

- Fixed issues with a blank page loading error state
- Misc. Enhancements


As always, we love hearing from our customers. Have an idea for a new feature or a general bug you need us to squash? Let us know at android@trunkclub.com
comments: Love Trunk Club! The stylists are quick to reply & answer questions. Seem to get my Style right away & suggest great things that. I might not have tried when shopping for myself.

The app is okay. One improvement I would make is to include the information of things that were returned just in case I would like to purchase the items in the future. Also a link to the Nordstrom website would be helpful. As @BiancaRodriguez pointed out, the Stylists do not seem to take note of customer likes and dislikes. The Stylists don't seem to read the notes and view the links available to them with information about the customer. The trunks are packaged beautifully. However, there is not an option for exchange of items (for size) and if there are other colors/patterns available for purchase. One good thing is that they don't push trendy items, but one of the reasons I am trying this service is to get me out of my normal and to try something new. I am finding that I prefer the "surprise" element from the other personal shopping service; they also seem to take my preferences into consideration.

The clothes are fine and the stylist is nice. The fact I can schedule on my own terms is amazing. They need more interaction with the clothes. They show all these outfits on the home screen and I have no way to say what I like and don't like. I feel like its really difficult to get my style into their system.

The Trunk Club service itself is fantastic & I'm a very happy customer but this app needs a whole lot of work. It's very limited in what it can do vs. just logging on to the website. Fewer item details are available & I've even missed new services that Trunk Club added due to thinking the app was fully functional. Chat is the only thing that is more convenient but UI elements tend to jump around & chat notifications are spotty at best. I'll primarily use the website going forward.

The mobile app sign-in doesn't work. It asks for your email address, then sends you a link to click through into the site, but the link takes you back to the page to submit your email address again. Please do not require me to check the box to add everyone in my contacts folder for this to work!

title: Solitaire Club
description:
Solitaire Club Online offers the most popular Klondike Solitaire variation.
The goal in Solitaire Club is to build four suit stacks on top, starting with aces, 2s, 3s, and so on, all of the same suit.
You can use 7 vertical row stacks as temporary holding areas where cards have to be placed in descending order and have to alternate between red cards and black cards.
The bottom card in each vertical row stack has to be a King.
You can move more than 1 card at a time, for example, by dragging several cards at once from one row stack to the other. You will continue playing until you build up the 4 suit stacks on top.

The bottom card in each vertical row stack has to be a King.
You can move more than 1 card at a time, for example, by dragging several cards at once from one row stack to the other. You will continue playing until you build up the 4 suit stacks on top.
summary: Solitaire Club - play and compete with other solitaire players for top score!

comments: Solitaire club application is very interesting game.it classic and all time good card game i enjoy it.
Solitaire club is great. Really great player to play
Solitaire Club was excellent game for spend my free time

This game has the same actors posing with checks as games such as(but not limited to); dice royale, lucky cat, lucky day, lucktastic, etc... all these games should be banned for false advertising. These are ad based games that never pay out. These games allow to to think you are gaining money and then they remove the ability to cash out or make it impossible to reach the minimum balance needed to cash out. Google Play and Apple Store should be ashamed for allowing these ads to be seen.
Solitaire club is best game, i really like it ...

title: Jigsaw Puzzle Club
description:
Welcome to the colorful world of jigsaw puzzles!
Jigsaw Puzzle Club provides hours of stress free entertainment for you and your whole family. Just pick an image from the rich library of the game, choose the difficulty of the puzzle and relax.

You will definitely like:
• FREE puzzles!
• More than 12,000 beautiful, high-definition puzzles
• Puzzles with animals, nature, landscapes, paintings and more
• Continuously updated puzzle library
• 5 difficulty levels
• Rotation mode for greater challenge
• Table and shelf modes for your convenience
• Work on more than one puzzle at a time and see your progress
• Simple and natural controls
• Valuable achievements and rewards!
• Jigsaw puzzles for adults
• Jigsaw puzzles for kids

______________________________

Follow us - twitter.com/aliasworlds

title: Club Mahindra
description:
1. Club Mahindra has been synonymous with good times and great vacations and now it has its own dedicated app to bring the travel enthusiasts even closer. The app will be a one-stop destination to provide the Club Mahindra patrons with all the information they would ever need regarding their stay. 

2. Viewing information about resorts – Whether you’re in the mood for a holiday in the mountains or a coastal cruise, the app gives you detailed information about each of our resorts. 

3. Requesting a Service to MR or Resort ops – Using the app, you can enjoy the convenience of requesting certain services at the resort. You can also get in touch with the Member Relationship team by calling them via the app itself.

4. To start with, one simply has to download and install the Club Mahindra app in their 
Smartphone from their Play Store Account and log in with their email id. It is that simple to get started. The app is absolutely free to download. 

5.The app facilitates easy navigation so planning a holiday is simple and quick. First, choose the dates of your holiday from the in-app calendar and mark your dates.
 
6. Next, scroll through your preferred destination and choose from the multitude of Club Mahindra resorts to book your stay for the duration. The app will also notify you about the various exciting deals and offers that the various resorts have from time to time so that you may get the best value for your money. 

7. Club Mahindra understands that each family is different and they have their own special requirements. Any special requirement that you may have can be requested and included from the app itself. 

8. The Club Mahindra app will enable you to book resorts and rooms instantly and all payments can be made directly via the app. All transactions will be done through a secure server and all your payment information will be strictly confidential. 

9. EMIs or ASF payments can be done via the app itself. 

10. The app will also allow the Club Mahindra members to share reviews and this would be done through the ratings option provided with the app
11. The Club Mahindra app allows you to Pre- Check in and this way you will be able to avoid the long queues when you are out vacationing with your family. Fill in all the required details through the app up to 48 hours prior to reaching the resort and once there, you can simply collect the keys and head straight to your rooms. 

12. Spread the Joy – You’ve joined the Club Mahindra family. And you can invite your friends and relatives too to experience magical moments like you do, through the app itself and earn rewards! 

13. Seeing all relevant notifications > Whether it’s an update about your bookings or the latest activities you can be part of at the resort, find out every detail through the app.

14.Update any details or information about your profile – Changed your contact number? Missed out on your preferred dining options? You can add it all to your profile through the app.

In other words, your stay with Club Mahindra will bring you guaranteed joy. Forget about looking for hotels and accommodations every time you think of a vacation. Instead, we help you save time and effort so that you can dedicate all your energy and concentration solely on spending time with your family. 
To give us feedback about your app experience or to resolve any issue, please get in touch with us at 1860 210 1111 or email at MemberRelations@clubmahindra.com

title: HORSE CLUB Horse Adventures
description:
Join HORSE CLUB for an exciting horse adventure!

In the HORSE CLUB app, the four friends Hannah, Lisa, Sarah and Sofia will take you to Lakeside Riding Stable. You will have exciting adventures, complete tasks and missions, take care of your horses and ride out together with the girls!

There is so much to discover in Lakeside – let’s get started!

Hint: The app requires at least version 4.4.4. Older devices can also cause problems with the graphic display due to the high image quality. An update to Android version 6.0 is therefore recommended to use the app.

WELCOME TO LAKESIDE RIDING STABLE!
• Design your own rider and choose your outfit
• Haflingers, Friesians and more: pick your dream horse!
• Discover the HORSE CLUB world

RIDE AND CARE FOR YOUR DREAM HORSES 
• Feed and groom your horses in the stable and collect treats for them
• Along woodland trails, the lake or the beach: your next ride out awaits you!
• Find cute Schleich® horses to collect as you ride on trails, cross-country and over jumps in the arena

BECOME PART OF HORSE CLUB
• Collect precious horseshoes and extend your HORSE CLUB world
• Help the HORSE CLUB girls with their daily stable chores
• Complete tricky missions and discover mysterious places

BECOME A HORSE WHISPERER 
• Extend your horse knowledge in a quiz with 400 questions and discover everything about horses!

What will you do first?

OUR MISSION:
We aim to produce excellent apps that make children’s eyes shine and assure parents of their quality at a glance. We support and inspire children and foster their development in a fun and playful way with our apps. In developing our digital products, we pay close attention to quality and to sustained fun, but also to product security. The concept behind the «HORSE CLUB Horse Adventures» app was developed and tested together with girls who are horse enthusiasts to reflect their interests and wishes optimally. The HORSE CLUB world can be explored freely or through exciting tasks focused on the topics of friendship, love for horses, and adventures. Read by the original audio book voices, the horse adventure in the company of the four HORSE CLUB girls will delight children from six years and up!

If something occasionally doesn’t work as expected …
We need feedback from HORSE CLUB fans to make technical improvements. Providing exact descriptions of any issues you encounter together with information on the device generation and operating system will help us to fix technical problems quickly.  If you have questions or suggestions for us, we are always happy to receive messages to apps@blue-ocean-ag.de

If you think the app is cool, let us know how you rate it in the comments!
The Blue Ocean team wishes you lots of fun with this game.

title: Detective Club Beeper
description:
This official app will help you and your friends share secret information quickly and conveniently while playing Detective Club board game.

ATTENTION! This app is not enough to play Detective Club board game. It is not an independent game. To play Detective Club you will need a retail copy of the board game.

The basic version of the app is absolutely free. You can pass a secret word with its help.

The advanced version allows you to pass a secret word, to vote and to score victory points with the help of the app. So, in this case, you need only cards and players boards for playing. In order to get the advanced version of the app, you have to buy it. You can do it from the basic version. If you want to play with the advanced version, only one player has to buy it. All others will join a game created by one person in the advanced version via their basic versions.

title: Club Premier
description:
At Club Premier we listen to you and work constantly on our app to bring the ultimate benefits to your fingertips. You will be able to view your balance and movements, as well as to accrue Premier Points for your flights and hotel stays (at the time or retro-actively up to six months after your trip if you were already a Member) and stay informed about exclusive promotions.



Download our app to find out about all the benefits, functionalities, products and services available to you:

- Review your Club Premier account balance and transactions
- Find out about the benefits of your Club Premier Tier
- Accrue Premier Points for your flights and hotels affiliated to Club Premier
- Review your progress towards the annual bonus and its payments and manage your Multiplica Plan
- Stay informed about exclusive promotions, discounts and sweepstakes to make you win unique experiences
- Discover the benefits of your cards American Express® Aeroméxico and Santander Aeroméxico
- View your progress towards the next Club Premier Aeroméxico Tier
- Find out about Concierge Premier, a tool to improve your user experience
- Discover affiliates close to you with regional content (Mexico - Spanish / International - English)
- Contact the Club Premier team
- Access Premier Lounges and VIP Skyteam* Lounges

*Depending on your Club Premier Member Tier
