comments: Very poor. Not as interactive as advertised. And not as realistic as advertised. When your slide locks back after emptying a clip in any weapon, and you discharge your empty mag and load a new mag in and release the slide with the button or pull back, IT SHOULD CHAMBER IN A ROUND. You gotta press a button to shoot, and everything is set to a certain selection. I choose select fire between 1.Safety 2.burst 3. Automatic, I wanna put on safety from burst, gotta go through auto. Realistically unsafe

The only thing that I really like about this app is the variety of weapons, especially the artillery. However the controls for many of the weapons are either too sensitive or too insensitive. For example the f1 grenade to my knowledge doesn't work at all and the app doesn't offer help for the grenade either. And the graphics lag far behind other gun apps.

I bought all the packs in this app and i had to get rid of it to leave some space but i got it back and i lost everything and i have to buy everyrthing back which is bullcrap! I want my money back now

It was good untill it stopped working so I uninstalled it and reinstalled the app and I lost everything in this dam game I mean I payed 20$ on this dam game and lost it! I mean this game was good but now I have only 15 guns or I pay 20$ again and for that much i can just get a game on Xbox. I loved the game but now it sucks. To bad. Do not buy if thinking to uninstall or just dont uninstall

title: Adventures in Odyssey Club
description:
The Adventures in Odyssey Club app is a Focus on the Family product that grants you access to ALL of the Adventures in Odyssey episodes plus exclusive content. An Odyssey Adventure Club membership is required for the app to log into your account.

The Adventures in Odyssey Club for families with kids 8-12 will enjoy the safe, fun online experience including monthly learning activities, daily devotions highlighting an audio adventure and more. 

Adventures in Odyssey Club is a great way to invest in your child’s spiritual growth, and have fun while doing it.

Features:

-Stream over 800 Adventures In Odyssey episodes
-Store up to 24 episodes to your device to save for later
-Complete activities that engage with the episodes
-Listen to exclusive audio episodes
-Watch exclusive video documentaries
-Share your stories with other Adventures in Odyssey Club members 

Focus on the Family is a donor-supported, global Christian ministry dedicated to helping families thrive.

comments: App stops working a few minutes in. I've removed it and downloaded it again with the same issues. We paid for a year and have been unable to listen to more than five minutes of an episode before it stops and kicks us off. It's disappointing because we love listening to AIO as a family.

Horrible. Love the stories. Love the concept. I grew up on AIO. I paid for a year today and can't get a single episode to play more than 7 minutes without it stopping. It keeps saying error and to restart the app. Extremely frustrating. Wish I'd just done a month.

Never had an issue with any of the versions and have had no issues with family members phones either. Love odyssey glad I get to share this with my family now generations growing up with this tool for Gods word
It's a wonderful app, but one thing is that it stops quite a bit. We pay every month but it stops all the time. It's been going on for a while but No one has done anything.
Very hard to find things, save your spot. No integration with Chromecast or Airplay. I love the content, but it's not a very liberating experience for the price of subscribing.

title: Ticket Club - No Fee Tickets to Events
description:
Ticket Club is where people in the know buy tickets.

Other ticket retailers sneak surprise fees into every purchase, which quickly pile up and cost you more. With Ticket Club, you’ll save every time. Get a premier membership and you won’t pay a dime in service fees. Ever.  

---- WIDE SELECTION ----
Ticket Club sources its tickets from one of the world's largest and most reliable exchanges. You’ll get the same great seats you would elsewhere, for much less. 

---- 100% GUARANTEE ----
Once your order is accepted, we guarantee your tickets will be valid and shipped in time for the event.

---- WHY IT WORKS ----
Ticket Club offers the same great tickets to the events you love at competitive prices. With a Premier membership, the price you see is the price you pay. Join our club and you’ll skip their fees. It’s that simple.

---- CUSTOMER REVIEWS ----

My family and I had a great night at the Atlanta Braves game! The tickets we purchased were very reasonable and the ballpark experience was incredible. Even got to witness a walk off Home run!

Cheapest price for the same tickets by far. I checked StubHub, Vivid and Ticketmaster resale site and these were the cheapest.

I went to Stubhub like normal and was fixing to pay $80+ in service fees. I looked around and got the same exact tickets without the service fees! 

They have an amazing selection of tickets, especially well-priced re-sale tix for broadway shows.

Ordered tickets to the MLB game (Nationals vs Marlins) online while in Washington, DC. No additional fees were charged on top of the listed price!

I had no problems receiving my etickets and I saved about $20 per ticket compared to other sites like seatgeek or vivid seats.

I had to purchase last event from StubHub which apparently does not have such a cutoff.
Simple, easy to use, and great prices. Was able to grab last minutes tickets with no issues, and saved over the entry gate price.
Great price for when concerts are sold out at Ticketmaster. Where other ticket resale apps rip u off for being desperate. The catch is you need to buy their membership or get it free from referral.
great app, happy with my purchase. thanks ticketclub
Good priced tickets. Love skipping the fees!

title: SEGA POCKET CLUB MANAGER
description:
Pocket Club Manager makes its way west for the first time on mobile devices! The game was designed to be as close to the original as possible,
complete with the same cycle of club management, player training, finance management and football gameplay. Join other players around the world
on a unique journey to create the best football club ever!

Start off small and make it big! Become a football Boss who can manage a local club, compete against the strongest, and even stand at the top of the world!
Gameplay is quick and easy to learn, and players will grow naturally as your club gets bigger. Expand your clubhouse and stadium while conquering one league after another!


■■■　Game Features　■■■

[Full utilization of the football match engine from the original series!]

- The engine used in past titles of the series has been revamped to provide even more fascinating play!

- Intervention during the game is unnecessary. Rather, player combinations and team tactics are the key to victory.

- Team strengths and weaknesses are easy to understand. Anyone can enjoy making a team and training players!


[FIFPro & Japanese National Player License Included!]

- Over 2,000 European League and Japanese National players appear under their actual names!

- Further, original players from the series have been included! Create your own, unique dream team!


[Includes an International Mode with data since 2002!]

- The International Mode from past entries in the series is back!

- Compete in huge International games every 4 years to become the world's top Boss!


[A Fascinatingly Fun Game Cycle!]

- The original series' game cycle of "Negotiation, Management, Coaching and Command" is reborn!

- Act as a full-time supervisor to raise your club to its rightful place among the stars!

[Unique Systems take Advantage of the Smartphone Platform!]

- Create players using photos taken with your camera using the Footie Face system!

- Your player can be either male or female. Progress through the game, and you'll even be able to create a team full of all your friends!

-------------------------------------------------
The use of images and names of the football players in this game is under license from FIFPro Commercial Enterprises BV. FIFPro is a registered trademark of FIFPro Commercial Enterprises BV.

公益財団法人サッカー協会公認
-------------------------------------------------

comments: Great game easy to play and you only need to spend money if you want

This game is pretty damn good a lot of new content could play without having to pay and still be able to somewhat keep up. Down side is the US support is a bit weak. There is no clear explanation to how certain things work if it changed before you start playing the game. Yet in the Japanese they have a full wiki to explain everything of the game.

If you enjoy football Sims then this is perfect for you! You can build your fantasy team and grow your players to build the perfect team. Additionally, you earn the premium currency at a decent rate and, if you save it, can use it to build a really strong team to compete with in the solo and online modes.

This game has a match engine of a beast but the team run the game are like headless chickens.All the contents in this game are very very boring after you finished the first 1 or 2 times. They have like 5 events and repeatrd it for like more than a year. The rewards from the events are also a joke, nothing really excite you to get after first few compishments. It's a Gacha game that you cant spend on anything for a month due to the banner last too freaken long time. Sega, fire this team or close

title: Bowling Club : Roller Ball Games
description:
Bowling Club is a bowling game that fully embraces the incredible 3D physics engine and effects.

Are you a bowling enthusiast? Do you like bowling games?
If your answer is yes! Come and play our most realistic 3D bowling game now!
No matter where you are, in the office, on the couch or in bed, you can play it anytime if you want!

How to play:
Slide the screen to throwing the gutterball!
Control the bowling move direction by tilting the phone to make a hook ball!
Try your best to knock down the bowling pins as many as you can!
Try to bowl a perfect full score!
Bowl more Spare and strike can help you make a higher score!

Game features:
-Realistic 3D graphics
-Reflective alleys and shiny bowling balls
-Multiple cool alleys
-Multiple beautiful balls

 If you like our game, please give five-star praise to support us, we will continue to work hard! There will be more games on the line, please continue to focus on us. If you have any questions, please send us an email. We will solve it as soon as possible. Thank you again!

-Multiple beautiful balls

description:
The ridiculous bike riding competition!

Bike and shoot your way through the crazy tracks at Big Wheelie's. Collect cards upgrade and beat your friends.

Reasons why you should join Bike Club

title: MyClubOnNet - Club and Rotary District Management
description:
My Club On Net is your Club Management and Member Interaction Application in the form of a Mobile App and also a  website, accessible from any device. 

MyClubOnNet is a great tool for Rotary District and Rotary clubs, along with their Club sponsored organisations such as Rotaract, Interact and RCC Clubs

My Club On Net not only helps Club administrators perform basic operations with ease, but also helps members to connect with the club and interact with other members.

Club Features include : 
Member Data Manager, Birthdays/Anniversary Reminders, SMS and Email Interaction, Address Labels, Club Activity,  Monthly E-Bulletin, Subscription Manager, Board of Directors, and more

If your club is a part of a District or Area
Powerful District/Area management features are available.

title: Club Manager 2019 - Online soccer simulator game
description:
Interested in playing manager games as a coach? Play this free soccer manager game and enjoy competing against other football managers in the best card-based football management game of 2019!

Lead your team to glory and make your mark as a football manager! Open football card packs in order to increase your chances of obtaining the top 11 soccer players, items and upgrades for your club. You can play the simulated online matches whenever you want to.

Online soccer manager game features:
- Football manager game with card packs – with the pack opener, you can collect the most unique and legendary cards made available in this soccer management game

- Play football matches whenever you want as a coach - you will be able to play several football games in the form of Division matches and exhibition matches on a daily basis

- As a director in this simulator game, you have the freedom to choose your line-up and decide on which tactics to apply

- Claim a free card pack every 3 hours and become the golden manager you have always dreamed of

- An intuitive user interface makes managing your top eleven, and club at large, quite easy

- Chat with soccer managers from all over the world with our instant in-game chat function

- Complete a range of achievements and milestones to elevate your reputation as a coach

- Enjoy the soccer experience in your own language. 

Club Manager 2019 supports: Czech, Danish, German, English, Spanish, French, Italian, Hungarian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovak, Serbian, Finnish, Swedish, Turkish, Greek, Bulgarian, Russian.

Join this amazing soccer manager sports app now and prove yourself as the best manager in the world! You won’t find any football apps as amazing and exciting as Club Manager 2019. Play now for free!

comments: Was skeptical at first but once you start playing or managing your team it's quite fun. I haven't found any problems with game play or anything like that. Ads are short, if u want to pay that's fine as well. I'd definitely recommend this game for the rapid soccer or footy fan. 5 stars ladies and gents.
Pretty good game. Takes things slow and steady. Hoping for better drop rates or more events to get better managers. 3 out of 4 of my unlocked clubs are stuck with not so great managers.

A very nice game but certain issues are therelike now im a 75ovr but always my match is fixed with 81 or 82 rated teams with 99 chem and i always lose the match and my scout is asking me to pay 2900 for just one 87 rated player what the heck please bring these down to reasonable prices like atleast 2100 is enough to buy a superstar so please see to it but othrwise its a fantastic enjoyable game
Everything is great but I think that the players should be able to recover stamina over time and not just stamina boosters. That would change my rating to a 5

The game makes it very hard to get good players or managers. Even worse, i keep losing matches and i am not sure what went wrong considering that i frequently tune my tactics, my team is pretty strong and my chemistry is always in the high 90s. I think this game could be far better if there is a more in dept analysis on matches such as what went wrong and what tactics could have been better for the next match. Lastly, please make it easier for players to get better players and managers.

title: Club Soccer Director 2019 - Soccer Club Management
description:
The best selling club management sim is back with loads of new features and data update for the 2018/2019 season

New countries added - Portugal, Holland, Turkey, Russia, Scotland, Argentina, USA, Brazil and Mexico
New Leagues from the countries above plus more leagues from the UK.

Intelligent Managers - Manager now use tactical gameplans to set up teams and adjust accordingly during the game like in real life

Matchday improvements and commentary - New match layouts and commentary giving greater insights into matches and the performance of players and staff

New Revenue Opportunities - Stadium advertising and board sponsorships.
New Staff - U23 Manager, Sports Scientist, Overseas Scout are all added to the game
Cloud save - save and play on any device!

Plus loads more

"Be more than just a soccer manager in Club Soccer Director 2019. Take on the role of Director of Football and manage the day-to-day running of an established soccer club or even create your own. Keep the Board happy by driving up revenues, hiring and firing staff, upgrading your stadium and facilities, signing sponsors, building your dream team and leading your club to ultimate glory!
 
CHOOSE FROM HUNDREDS OF CLUBS
Choose from 820 clubs in 38 leagues from 14 different countries across the world. Create your legacy and build your team from scratch including home country, club and stadium name and even kit design. 
 
UNRIVALLED CLUB-LEVEL MANAGEMENT 
Manage every aspect of your club’s development and how you invest funds. Develop and upgrade your club's facilities, including the stadium, training ground and youth Academy. Increase revenues by negotiating sponsorships. Hire and fire your management team and build your dream squad by negotiating transfers and offers with player agents as well as handling contract negotiations with players and staff alike. 
 
EVERY DECISION COUNTS 
Just like real life, your decisions affect the attitude of the board, team morale and even the fans. How you engage with press and media, ticket prices, the quality of your squad and the potential of your Academy prospects all have a bearing.
 
LIFELIKE STATS ENGINE
Club Soccer Director 2019’s comprehensive live-action stats engine mirrors real-life player behaviour and match outcomes, processing over 1000 decisions per game and generates real-time statistics for both individual players and teams. 

TACTICAL FREEDOM
Leave key decisions to the manager or overrule him by implementing your own play style as well as deciding on team lineup, formation, in and out-of-possession tactics, substitutes and more.
 
COMPREHENSIVE PLAYER DATABASE
Buy or loan players from a database of over 30,000 players, each with their own unique play styles, stats and behaviours. Club Soccer Director 2019 continuously generates new players on a regular basis, ensuring you have plenty of talent to choose from whether you’ve been in the hot-seat for 1 season or 10!   Player cycles continue beyond the pitch as some retiring players go into staff roles just as they do in real life!

DEVELOPED BY A REAL SOCCER COACH AND MANAGER!

Copyright Notice
Club Soccer Director allows users to take part in a real world soccer environment and recreate events in a real world football environment.
  
Third party names are used only to describe actual involvement in such events and for no other reason. No third party (player, club, organisation or other) endorses or is associated with Club Soccer Director and Go Play Games Ltd makes no representation of any kind.
  
No proprietary image or likeness of any third party (player, club, organisation, stadium or other) is intentionally used in this software product and any similarity with any graphical element of this software product is co-incidental and does not imply any endorsement or association with Club Soccer Director. 
 
All third party trademarks are the property of their respective owners and Go Play Games Ltd makes no warranty or representations in respect of them."

title: The Rave / Eagles Club
description:

Use the mobile app to get concert information, watch interviews, view concert pictures, and more!

title: PRIVILEGES CLUB
description:
Shop, scan & WIN with the PRIVILEGES CLUB mobile App!

The PRIVILEGES CLUB app is designed to give you access to tailored news and rewards from your favourite Alshaya brands. Every time you shop or dine at any of the participating outlets, you will be able to scan your app and enjoy exclusive benefits. 

When you download the app, you will be able to do the following:

•	Follow your favourite brands
•	Stay up to date on their latest news
•	Receive customised offers
•	Track your monthly and super prize draw entries and days left to the draws
•	Check your purchase history
•	Manually add a receipt that you’ve forgotten to add in store 
•	Update your profile
•	Locate stores near you
•	Rate your shopping experience 
•	Tell us how you would like to be contacted 

And much more! 

Your journey with the PRIVILEGES CLUB app will be full of special moments and exciting surprises. You do not need to be a big spender to benefit. So, whether you are a regular shopper, dedicated diner or only buy when the sales are on, it’s worth downloading!

comments: I have been using the privilege card for years and never bothered check my privileges over the years due to busy life style. And today I decided to give there app a try... And i was expecting a big surprise... NO... the app after I updated my card says that I never had any purchase history. And treated me as a new member... The question is what happened to all these card swipes at Al shaya stores... I have spent hundreds if not over a thousand KD over the years..After that experience. Worthles.

when I used the application I couldn't link it with the card (1st problem). 2nd problem: when I added the receipt after downloading tha app it gave an error telling me that the receipt date has to be after the download not before. This is not what I was told in the store so please fix that problem or cancel the application if it is not working well.

Bug in the application everytime you open "Error Oops! There's been an unexpected error. Please try again." Also, this app doesn't scan invoices for online purchases & neither it's mentioned in their policy (app) until you call them & find out.

Such a scam. Tried to use this card/app over the last couple years and I'm pretty sure it's just a scam. I was willing to give them the benefit of the doubt the first time my information was erased after amassing points, but the second time? Customer service can't reset or even locate my account with my phone number, registered email, or Civ ID? Too much of a coincidence to have happened twice. Skip this personal data gathering app as it doesn't bring any value to you anyway.
Cannot even get past the first step of registering the card. No sms verification is sent despite multiple tries.

title: AZ Lottery Players Club
description:
The official Arizona Lottery Players Club app offers our players a quick and convenient means to manually enter or scan eligible non-winning tickets into current Promotions.

App features include:
• Manual and Scan Ticket Entry for Promotions
• Drawing Schedules
• Winner Lists
• Promotion Rules

Subject to applicable rules, regulations and laws. Must be 21 years or older to play. Please Play Responsibly. Gambling Problem? Call 1.800.NEXT STEP (1-800-639-8783).

For questions or comments regarding this app, please contact us using the feedback form in the app or website.

It is important to note that we do not accept wagers, bets, or payments of any kind through our website/apps and we only offer age-controlled products that are sold at authorized retailers within the state. Thank you.

comments: I like being able to scan the scratchers and lotto tickets to see if I have won anything because I often miss that I have won. Being able to enter my non winning scratchers in their second chance drawing is cool too. The app is a little buggy sometimes like errors connecting to the online network and freezes. The overall app experience could best be described as a little rough around the edges and somewhat of a learning curve. I would recommend just using the website and save some space.

I also can't use the scanning function. manually entering it is so time consuming. Also i thought the scanning feature was to tell me whether or not the ticket is a winner, as i understand it now i think it's just to enter the second chance games.
Sucks.UPDATE FROM LAST NOV 2019: I like the app.maybe it's the device I was using it on. But it works a lot better most of the time anyways. Thank you for making improvements.
This app can only scan scratcher tickets Not draw games like powerball, megamillion. Developer, please state this on the description. Thanks.
Not once has this app ever scanned a ticket for me, I have tried many different types.

title: Tommy Bahama Island Club
description:
Our founders sketched out the idea for Tommy Bahama on cocktail napkins while sipping pina coladas at the beach. We didn’t just invent a fictional character; we fashioned a lifelong philosophy of leisure.   

Tommy Bahama brands have grown to represent the good life in all its wonderful forms. We are purveyors of Island lifestyle. If our guests are only waist deep in relaxation, we want them fully immersed. Whether it’s a piece from our men’s and women’s sportswear collections, a rattan chair, a sip of our ultra premium rum or dining at one of our restaurants, all our fine things should be enjoyed unhurried. 

  Life is one long weekend at Tommy Bahama.

Download our app to get access to free apps, cocktails and extra perks. Here’s how it works:
1) Register your credit/debit card(s) in the app.
2) Shop as usual.
3) We’ll buzz your phone when you earn a reward. No need to fish your phone out, check-in, or scan anything. Just pay as usual.
4) Rewards show up on your phone for you to use. It's like magic!
